I switched to this shampoo about three months ago because my wife likes the way it smells.I have become a convert:  It works great without drying me out or leaving me feeling oily.Truth is, I really like the way it smells too.

This is my third Vornado product.  I don't know how to say it any other way, but Vornado has it right!  These may not be quite as quiet as a Dyson, but they move air much better than a Dyson ever does.  Vornado fans can truly circulate air at an almost unbelievable rate.  Whether heating or cooling, I simply have not ever been disappointed by a Vornado fan.  Vornado is to fans, as Shark is to vacuum cleaners... I'll take either over a Dyson, any day.  Highly recommended!

I have generally been quite happy with Black & Decker tools over the years.  This chainsaw does not disappoint, in any way.It has plenty of power, provided you use a 14-gauge extension cord or better, and will handle any cutting work the typical home owner is ever likely to encounter.I used it to cut a 12" diameter oak tree that was too close to the house.  This chainsaw handled it with no problem.

If first impressions are important, then this thing is awesome.  It feels and looks of quality.  Add to that, it works perfectly too.  It's super easy to use and it cuts clean and sharp.  Highly recommended.

What else can I say:  This adapter worked on the first try on my recently upgraded to Windows 10 Acer Ultrabook with SSD.  I booted the computer without any sort of Internet connection (20-30 seconds).  I plugged in the adapter.  I waited for Windows to make it ready to use (about 10 seconds).  I plugged in my Ethernet cable (the network connection was almost instantaneous, but my network didn't give me Internet access for another 20-30 seconds or so.  Now, I am writing and posting this review using that Internet connection.That is what I call Plug - n - Play!  Highly Recommended!!!

As a disabled guy, getting in to and out of the car is something of a challenge.  I usually am able to use my cane for that purpose, but occasionally it's not enough.  This little handle is just what I needed (and didn't know existed) to help on those days.  It works with our vintage Jaguar and also in our modern Nissan.  Overall, I am very pleased with this product.  That it offers an emergency flashlight too, well that is just a great bonus.  Highly recommended.

This arrived safely and was very well packed.  The set-up was simple; just follow the instructions.  It was a little unnerving to have to bend the steel butterflies myself, but it worked out fine.It's a lovely piece and looks great in our front yard.  Most importantly, it doesn't make noise when spinning.  A very pleasant and satisfying decoration.

I'm just so impressed with De'Longhi.  This is my second indoor grill from that company.  The first one is still going strong and is a regular part of our cooking life.This unit features a non-stick ceramic coating on the cooking surface.  It feels like a Zirconium based ceramic.  Of course, that means that it is super hard... you could sharpen our knives on it, but it also means that it is brittle and can be chipped by hard impact with steel, etc.  It's best to use plastic or silicone utensils, just to be safe.  If you do that, this thing will probably live forever.It functions perfectly:  Heat-up is super fast and clean-up is crazy easy (just wipe with a wet towel).  I especially like the included splash protector for the sides and back (it stores neatly inside the unit when not needed.  Oh, you can store the power cord inside the unit too... there's lots of room in there.Overall, this is a great cooking surface.  It works great, it looks great... this is a great option.  Highly recommended!

This mounting bracket from Belkin is constructed of solid, top quality materials and is very well executed.  Everything comes fully assembled and pre-set in perfect mounting positions for the switch, but you can make adjustments if needed.
These are some sweet sticks.  They are strong, weighty (yet perfectly balanced) and the feel is super smooth with just enough shape for good control.  The acorns are perfectly shaped and sized.

These are waterproof, rip resistant and easy to use.  Wether for bottle, object or location labeling these are awesome.Or, try thinking outside of the box:  How about printing small maps, contact info or emergency instructions to take with you on your next outdoor adventure.These are awesome! Highly recommended!

These are super soft.  They are just right for protecting the tiny ones from scratching their faces, etc.  They are quite nice and very well made.My wife is very pleased with these.  Highly recommended!

I use Nitrile gloves as a regular part of my life.  The Ammex brand is the one that I currently use most often because they seem to hold up better than most others when encountering sharps.  I had the opportunity to try these Xtreme Nitrile gloves (thicker / tougher) during a recent set of exercises and boy can I tell ya:  These are a serious step up in protection.  These Xtreme gloves are much thicker and heavier.  They can take some serious abuse and remain intact (within reason, of course).  These are Nitrile gloves that you can trust when the moment comes.

If you are installing an overhead shower like this, then you'll be very pleased with this one.The quality and construction are truly excellent.  Every part is super strong, the internals are solid bronze.Each of the four heads is four direction adjustable for that perfect custom installation to provide the perfect shower experience.Kohler is providing an excellent quality piece of luxury shower equipment with this outstanding system.Also, I'd suggest having a professional install it... It's not as simple as changing a shower head.High Recommended!!!

Made in the USA by a family owned company, these stakes are of excellent quality.  Walnut Hallow sells good wood.You'll pay more and get less, however you crunch the numbers, with most commonly available competitor's stakes.  Highly recommended!
This turned out to be exactly what my little Superman fan wanted.  The figures are well assembled and the painting is accurate and consistent.  He's a happy little Super Dude!

I'm reviewing these because I've been using them for almost two years now; I just ordered my third package of them.When it comes to price point vs quality, these razors are hard to beat.  The shave is smooth and safe (no nicks).I tend to shave in the shower with these, without any sort of creams or lotions.  I've tried adding such things, but the seem unnecessary with these razors.These razors do a great job, giving me a smooth close shave, without hurting my gorgeous face.  üòä

I have had this case for 3 years and it is a life saver. Despite stuffing and I mean STUFFING this item with electronics the zipper shows no signs of wear and this case has expanded to fit much more than one would guess when just looking at it. It is the perfect thing to organize all your cords and chargers and to hold all those extra cables that comes with electronics. It can honestly hold a ton of items with ease. I probably have around 50 cables of varying sizes in this thing along with other wall chargers. The case is very well made and meant to withstand abuse and the material it is made out of is thick and sturdy. The elastics inside have also been pulled on and many cords have been put under them yet they have not stretched out or gone limp. If you have tons of cables lying around with no where to put them this is the answer.I hate to say this because I love amazon but this case is much better than the amazon basics cable case.I recently purchased another cable organizer case from a different brand and the quality just doesn't compare and am back to purchase another one of these.

I purchased this for my 2.5 gallon beta tank. I wasn't really pleased with the filter that came with it and this filter is a large improvement with some modifications. First off the filter must sit completely flat to function best and have a fair amount of gravel over it to keep the current down for your fish. I also put a small plant on top of the base. The plant that comes with this is cheap, tacky, and will rip your fishes fins, throw it away. The base has a diameter of about 6 inches so make sure you have room for it. I put 2.5 pounds of gravel in my 2.5 gallon tank to make sure the base was completely covered and held down. The carbon that comes with the filter is junk and needs to be replaced. Pop the black lid off, take out the moss, dump the carbon, fill it with your own carbon I use (Marineland PA0373 Black Diamond Activated Carbon, 40-Ounce, 1134-Gram), replace the moss and snap the lid back on and run water through it. I cut the clear tubing down by an inch so that it would be the proper height in my tank. Then I used Deep Blue Professional ADB12296 Silicone Air Tubing for Aquarium, 25-Feet andSingle Way Aquarium Control Air Water Flow Lever Valve along with the lowest powered air pump you can find to complete the set up.

This is a much much better case than the one that comes with the pill. Plus it comes in different colors so I could get pink to match my nicki minaj 2.0 pill. The case is very hard and durable material so I do not worry about my pill getting damaged during travel. It fits very snugly and isn't bulky at all. I now use the original case to hold the cables and charging accessories. Great case, recommended.

At the price these are, which is ridiculously expensive for a no-name company, I was expecting the Mercedes of bluetooth headphones. I hate to give these 1 star but I seriously cannot recommend them.Pros:-Stylish as hell. These look and are packaged like something Monster designed.-Very comfortable. Three pairs of earbud tips allow these to stay in your ears very securely.-Neck collar style is very convenient as it allows earbuds to not get caught on anything or get pulled out of your ears.-Sound quality. Probably the clearest I've heard from any bluetooth headphones where the sound quality is normally compromised but this is a very impressive and clear sound with no obvious distortions. I own over 100 headphones/earbuds and I am picky about audio quality.Cons:-BUILD QUALITY!!!! Oh my goodness I cannot believe how flimsy and thin these headphones are. These are waiting to break any second and I take extremely good care of my technology. The neck band is a very thin plastic that bends back and forth so easily, an infant could snap this in a second. This is just waiting to break. The cords to the earbuds are also SO thin, earbuds from a dollar store would have a thicker cord. These are going to break or at least defect so quickly. They also come with no case so I have't a clue how people protect or travel with these.-Volume. I do not in any way listen to my headphones loud or am out to damage my hearing. What is so confusing is that there is a voice that says "pairing successful" and a "beep" that signifies when you have hit the lowest or highest volume (on the headphone controls) that is MUCH louder and annoying than the volume of the music ever gets. I find myself frequently hitting the highest volume and the headphones are in no way very loud.-Now the defect. While this pairs easily to my ipod the headphones frequently skip and distort. There is no loss of connection but when changing songs or when skipping to the next song the headphones will not play music for about 5 seconds. The headphones also fall behind when skipping many songs. In the middle of a song the headphones will also occasionally drop the song. There is NO loss of bluetooth connectivity, the headphones simply have a defect. I originally thought it was my one pair but no, I returned that pair and ordered another one and it does the exact same thing.-Battery life. A six hour battery life is fairly short though some people seem to think it is long lasting in this price range the battery life should at least be ten hours.- Sneers customer service. I contacted them about the defect and while they responded they simply told me to order a different pair of headphones from them and return these. What? It seems they know this defect exists but they don't wish to do anything about it. Terrible.-Price, not even close.These headphones should never have been released with their connection defect and build quality. Avoid.

First off if you are a half size size down. Due to the high setting of this ring it fits looser.I simply couldn't resist buying this ring. I have never ever seen a tiara setting like this and it is so pretty. This is by far my favorite ring setting.The ring is absolutely gorgeous. The CZ cut is perfect and there are indeed so many facets that it just sparkles and the clarity is amazing. The CZ is the amazon curated collection is the best CZ I've ever seen.The issue with this ring is that the stone is so SO HUGE. I purchased this to wear on my middle finger and if I had purchased it to wear on my ring finger the stone would literally take up the entire width of my finger. The setting is also very high so it protrudes out a lot making the stone look ever larger. It is simply not possible to ever wear this ring without virtually everyone noticing.....which could be a good or bad thing. If you are fabulously wealthy and dress extremely well then this ring probably could look real on your finger and it will blow people away. However if you are an average person (like me) then this ring is simply too huge to ever be believable. Also, many diamonds unless they are high high grade do not have extremely clarity so the size plus the clarity of this ring makes it really not believable. A ring around this size and clarity would honestly retail for around $30,000 so on the right person this would fit.However I do still love the craftsmanship here and the ring is undeniably beautiful. I will just be wearing it around the house for guilty pleasure. I also purchased the Platinum Plated Sterling Silver Round Cubic Zirconia Yesterday, Today, Tomorrow 3-Stone Ring which, in my opinion, looks much more believable on the average person.

These headphones deliver some of the best sound in *closed back* headphones in the under $300 range. They are a classic set of cans from the legendary Koss that have been around for decades. But these haven't aged that well (they haven't changed at all) and some changes would be highly beneficial.Pros:-Excellent sound stage as mentioned above, becomes much better after about 50 hrs of burn in. A very flat and clean response, requires a lot of power to get it though (see later).-Closed back so sound does not leak (though closed back vs open back is a matter of preference).-Build like a tank. Pretty sure these were intended to survive the apocalypse. If you ever see an army general wearing headphones it would likely be these.-Superb noise isolation. Though these are not active noise cancellation they are so thick and so tight to your head you can be barely hear any outside noise.-Koss's excellent lifetime warranty!-Really amazing price considering the sound and build quality and power impedance.Cons:-EXTREMELY HEAVY! Brace yourselves. Do not hang these from your neck!!-Very dated in style...probably the most dated headphones of all time along w/ the portapros (still love those).-Extremely bulky and awkward sitting on your head. Not very comfortable as the weight of the headband pushes down on select points on your head.-Maybe the ugliest headphones ever? The color is not appealing and should have been changed long ago. (if looks matter to you).-Earpads. I find the earpads so uncomfortable. They do not breathe whatsoever (they are not leather or velour) and they collect sweat against your skin even in very short periods of time. Apparently they are also filled with a liquid and will eventually puncture?....I didn't wait around to find out and replaced them with the Brainwavz velour replacement pads.-Cord is not detachable! Although I have heard some people can take these apart and replace the cord, all the power to you but it's beyond me.-This is made worse by the fact there is little strain relief on the 1/4" end. The cord is also coil and not very long. But you can get an extension.-Boom mic option is still there, another thing that could have gone as these are never used anymore.Other points:-These are not portable!! They have a 250 ohm impedance and need a good amp. The sound on these is very very laid back. I have the HD 650s which have a 300 ohm impedance and these headphones require more power. I personally love Fiio amps but there are loads of amps here on amazon that will work.-This is further emphasized by the 1/4" end that is intended to plug into a desktop amp. No adapter included.So there you go, my thoughts on these legendary cans.

I had originally purchased the peridot headphone stand by brainwavz for my Sennheiser HD 650s but I didn't like how bulky it was, how much room it took up, the enormous logo, and the way it stretched my headphones so I returned it. I originally bought this stand for a different set of headphones as I thought it would be too small to hold the 650s but it is PERFECT! The gap in the center of the head band padding on the 650s sits perfect on the top of this stand and the stand is the perfect height. The base isn't very large however the stand isn't going anywhere. Unlike the gypsum and quartz styles this has raised edges on the sides of the top to keep the headphones from going anywhere. There is no assembly required and the stand is very thick and solid. It does not take up too much room and is the perfect size for my crowded desk. The only two cons I see:-the very large brand name. I'm not sure why they feel the need to do this, I think putting the brand small and off to the side would be perfectly fine. That being said the headphone covers up the brand name very well on this.-Fingerprint magnet. I wish there was some sort of fingerprint resistance coating Brainwavz would consider putting on their headphone stand. A microfiber cloth with a screen cleaner cleans this off best though! (better than windex)

This device is a life saver...or a cord saver and I am so happy to have found it! My speaker sits against the wall and the 3.5mm detachable cable was constantly getting pushes against the wall and because of the straight jack was damaging the wires creating static and needing to be replaced.Enter this gizmo.This will plug into any case no matter how narrow the opening or any speaker jack because of it's design it sits farther out allowing the jack to fit into any space. It is gold plated and very sturdy. My cable is now in perfect condition thanks to this and best of all there is absolutely NO distortion or static when moved or wiggled or anything. No loss of quality whatsoever. I plug my mediabridge cable into this and they are a perfect team.

I have never been a fan of sigmas brushes for the most part (they shed and lack quality control) that being said this is simply the BEST spoolie in the world and is worth the extra money. It has a thin, sleek design with a solid ferrule but what sets it apart is the stiffness of the bristles. If you take just about any other spoolie and press the end between your fingers it is very soft and will collapse. Not this one. It is very very stiff and holds it's form making it perfect for separating eyelashes and combing out the curl. The difference between this and my MAC spoolie is actually night and day...and I can't believe I'm saying that?!Simply the best spoolie ever.

It seems to be completely impossible to find a quality dual headphone stand. Headphone stands are so simple yet seem impossible to get one of good quality with the best quality ones being by brainwavz yet are covered in their label. On top of that headphone stands in the stores are way wayy over priced so like usual amazon is your best bet.I was looking for a dual wood stand as I like the clean look of wood and as Cosmos stands are of terrible quality this seemed the best option.Pros:Nice look, fairly clean though the wood isn't totally blemish free that's okay.Holds heavy headphones well without tipping over. I've put Sennhiesers, beats, audio technicas, etc. and never worried about the safety of the headphones.Price is ok.Cons:When taken out of the box it is covered in sawdust that got everywhere and I wasn't expecting that. You need to wipe it down yourself.The holes on this are not sanded at all and again you really need to sand them yourself.The slight ledge on the top where the headphones sit is rough on the edges. This bothered me as it could possibly damage headphones so again I carefully sanded these parts down.I have found self assembly headphone stands are disasters. Not because I'm lazy but because the screws never tighten or fit well. These tighten okay but when screwing together (using a Philips head screwdriver, the one that comes with this is junk)  when you feel resistance I would stop as you could easily crack the wood. Mine is ever so slightly loose but it doesn't move when I take headphones on and off. I fear however that the screws are gong to become loose over time and not hold up very well.One thing that REALLY bothers me. The top of the stand has the exposed screw head sitting into the wood. It would be so SO simple for the company to include a rounded wood end to pop in the hole to finish the top. Would look 10x better and cleaner.As far as the grips go on the bottom. Scotch makes clear, small, circular grips that stick to any surface and are extremely easy to use and can be found at any craft or office supply store.All in all okay but I will be looking for a better one.

FIRST OFF: The volume controls do not work with apple products (this product was not made for apple) but the play pause and answer call button does work. Also, if you have trouble getting these to stay in your ears the Acoustibuds and EarSkinz (available here on amazon) fit these perfectly and will provide more noise isolation if that is what you're going for.If you like apples earpods and want a second pair or broke your pair and don't want to pay apples price/risk getting a fake this is your answer, although better.These are design to sit in your ear in basically the same way apples do. There are no gel tips and covers just the plastic earbud that sits outside your ear canal. I have medium sized ears and these sit perfectly fine, they actually fit better then apples as they are tapered so as to sit better. These are not noise canceling/isolating!!! And they are not designed to be. The earbud sits outside your ear, there is no plug or rubber tip to create an air tight seal, so you will hear plenty of outside noise. This is perfect for your everyday, on-the-go use. On the train, on the bus, where you can hear your stops and you don't have to fuss with getting the earbuds in and out of your ears.The build quality is excellent. They have volume buttons and play/pause or answer call. The cable is wide and tangle-free with a matte finish. Best of all there are magnets on each earbud on the end that allow them to snap together and keep everything tangle free! You don't have to fuss with pushing the headphone straightener up the cord the magnets automatically snap together and keep the ear buds together.The sound quality is satisfying, it is not audiophile-$150+ quality, but it isn't meant to be! These are 100% designed as on-the-go convenient headphones and they are excellent at that. Music sounds good, calls sound good, they are tangle free, earbuds snap together, quick to put in your ears, and you can hear everything around you without unplugging. Excellent design and features for what they are meant to be.

I have owned way way too many makeup brushes in my life. Ranging from drug store to make up stores to online companies to department stores to popular high end brushes like MAC I have tried just about any brushes I can get my hands on. These brushes are, hands down, some of the best brushes you will ever find and are on par with ANYTHING you will buy from a high end brand (MAC, Bobbi Brown etc.) and IMO are much better than experiences I've had with Sigma brushes. They are better than brushes at sephora (!!!), Ulta, Walmart, and other popular makeup stores.The brushes are incredibly soft high grade synthetic hair. I normally like a mix between natural and synthetic brushes but you won't be able to tell the difference between this synthetic hair and soft, natural hair. These brushes are universal as they can be used with powder and also liquid as they won't adsorb it. They pick up make up so well and apply it just as well.The look to these brushes is gorgeous. They have correct length handles, not too long, not too short (about 6 inches including the ferrule). The handles are rock solid and very sleek and have a sort of matte finish which adds to their beauty. The handles of the face brushes are thick and sit very well in your hand. The ferrules are very secure. The brushes are incredibly soft and very dense yet they are incredibly fluffy and each is labeled (I particularly LOVE the powder brush! The stippling brush is also amazing and it is a genuine stippling, easily comparable and as good as my MAC 187). These brushes also come packaged individually and the face brushes have BRUSH GUARDS!! Not the cheap plastic but actual mesh netting brush guards that are very long and fit each brush exactly.On top of the excellent quality of the brushes is the case. The case is amazing!! It is a rectangular box that splits in the middle and is held together by a very strong magnet. There is plenty of extra room to add other brushes and the case is rock solid and matches the brushes in color. They gold stitching is secure and the case, whether or not it is real leather, could fool anyone.These are not cheap brushes and it is clear a lot of thought and effort went into these brushes to make them the best they possibly could be. These are professional make up brushes and no matter what brushes you have owned before, whether drug store or MAC, Sigma, Bobbi Brown, you will be impressed with these brushes. The only difference is with these you are not paying the exorbitant amount for a brand name. Guaranteed. Highly recommended. On top of that these brushes have a lifetime guarantee, can't go wrong.On a side note, in the instructions I really appreciate that the company says you do not need to buy an expensive brush cleaner but can just use a mild shampoo (I use baby shampoo) as I have had several moderate to higher end brushes that companies insist you buy their pricey brush cleaner so it's very nice the company here isn't trying to sell you on that.

First off if you are going to purchase these purchase them shipped AND sold by amazon to ensure you get an authentic product and the warranty is valid.I was casually browsing headphones and came across these inexpensive monster headphones. In the low $40 price range I thought I had nothing to lose to try them.They come professionally packaged but the packaging isn't as extravagant as many of monsters products but still would make a nice gift. There is a small booklet on them earbuds, about 5 pairs of tips, a hard small black monster carrying case, and 3.5mm extender right angle cord (totally pointless). I am not sure why this cord is included as the jack to the headphones should just be a right angle and it is only about 4 inches long and just adds weight to the earbuds (which is problematic). It is not an adapter, they are both 3.5mm. Microphone and volume controls function well for music and answering calls.Sound: Typical monster sound that they are known for. If you are a fan of the beats tour then you will likely like these. A tight and slightly warm bass that is very present along with clear mids and highs. Either you will like the sound or you will want something less bass-y and more neutral (which you will pay more for).Build quality: Monster is not known for bulletproof build quality so I knew this when I purchased them but the actual look to these headphones is very cheap. The cable is not of the same material as the beat tours or gaga's heartbeats or any other of their flat cable headphones. The cable is narrow and has lots of kinks in it and is definitely not tangle-free. All this looks rather cheap which is disappointing. I wouldn't test the build quality of the cable or the ear pieces because they likely won't hold up.Comfort/fit: These earbuds do not stay in my ears. I have tried all the tips and they fall out as they extend far out of your ear and have very large ends that weigh them down. As said before the right angle jack extension also weighs them down if you choose to use that. I have resorted to using these with comply foam tips to keep them in.The look to these headphones is not nearly as stylish as some of monsters others but these are on the lower end price wise. If you enjoy the sound quality and can get them to stay in your ears then they are probably worthwhile just don't have too high of expectations.

I purchased the five set kabuki brush which I'm realizing now was a little overkill (how many kabuki brushes can you have?) but I was highly intrigued by the set and the companies dedication.First impression. The packaging is great. The brushes come individually packaged and the brush holder all come in a box filled with pink confetti and a very cute sticker (that I won't spoil for you:), this would make a perfect gift for any makeup lover.When I opened the bags for each brush they emitted and awful smell. Seriously they smelt awful which was an initial turn off. I immediately washed them my preferred way, with baby shampoo, and the smell was gone. I am still not fan of the idea that the brushes came loaded with chemicals but this is the only con.The brushes are AMAZING. Incredibly dense and full yet incredibly soft and pick up makeup so well. These apply effortlessly and really give your skin an airbrushed look. So easy to use yet so effective. These brushes are far better than Sigma's kabuki though somewhat different, Sigma's have a slightly larger head and are fluffier however these are denser and equally as soft as Sigmas and I find the denseness gives a better application. I won't be using my Sigma again any time soon. These brushes also have a great weight to them. Very heavy duty wood handle with a sturdy metal ferrule, you can tell the quality just by holding them.On top of this Beauty Junkees has some of the best customer service I've ever experienced. When I received the kit the leather tube was too small to hold all the brushes and I was very confused. I contacted the seller who responded right away and said they had made their brushes denser which in return caused them to be larger and they no longer all fit in the tube. She told me they were in the process of making a new larger tube and offered to send me one when they were completed in a few months. Well during this time the seller kept me up to date on the production of their tubes and sure enough I received one via priority mail wrapped in pink tissue paper. This tube is perfect for holding all the brushes and is a beautiful leather and very very solid. Beauty junkees truly cares about their customers satisfaction and was extremely kind and prompt in their response. I have since bought several of their other products because I value their great quality and great customer service.Can't go wrong with this brush or this company.

First off I'd like to say that Crave Naturals is a wonderful company with amazing and fast customer service and that I highly recommend their products.This is great argan oil and it is 100% pure and highly concentrated. It comes with a dropper and lid pump that screws right on the bottle. The bottle is darkened glass to preserve the oil.The way I use this oil is using the lid pump I pump ONE DROP into my hand and rub it into the ends and lower half of my hair. I have thin, dry, shoulder blade length hair and one pump is all I need. This stuff is extremely concentrated and using too much with cause you to look like you bathed your hair in lard. Seriously use very very little. I use this in the morning before using heat products on my hair and this is by far the most effective heat protection available (forget CHI). Your hair style will last all day and any frizz or dryness is taken care of 100%. Liquid gold for you hair. Any leftover in your hair can be rubbed into your nails and cuticles.The reason I knock off a star is that this oil seems a little overpriced. It is definitely high quality argan oil but it is only ONE 2oz. bottle (I was confused by the photos as it seemed it came with 2 bottles but I contacted the company afterwards and it is only one). I have purchased bottles double this size for less than the $30 cost of this one. I am not sure whether I will purchase it again but I love the quality plus crave naturals always includes a 25% off amazon coupon for their products:).

These are good quality brushes and are definitely well crafted and made of high quality materials. First thing though is these brushes are TRAVEL SIZED. I put this in caps because this is not listed anywhere in the title or description. The brush handles are only about 4.5" long. I was really really surprised by how small the whole set was (including the case) but this doesn't take away from the quality of the brushes. I am personally not a fan of the shorter handles as they make the brush harder to hold. I will be posting photos of the set.The case that comes with this set is amazing. Genuine leather and rock solid. It is slightly larger than a red bull can. This case is literally bulletproof and these brushes are perfect for travel as this can easily get banged around in a suitcase without any damage to the brushes or case. I have owned a lot of great makeup brush cases and none are as thick and solid as this case. It has to be held to be believed.The brushes are beautiful. Sleek, heavy duty, wood handles and copper ferrules. The brushes are natural and synthetic and I have experienced no shedding. No cheap materials here. Here's my rundown of the brushes.Eyeshadow brush-appears to be pony (sable) hair. AMAZING BRUSH! As good as anything MAC has ever made. Very very soft but firm enough to get a great application and picks up and applies make up flawlessly.Eyebrow brush-appears to be synthetic. This was the brush that initially led me to this page and I decided to get the whole pack because it was so intriguing. This brush is pretty good. Very firm and allows you to fill in your eyebrows well. It isn't quite as dense as I might have liked but still good.Eyebrow and eyelash comb-plastic and synthetic. Nothing special here just your very basic drugstore comb.Smudge brush- appears to be goat hair. This brush tends to be used for getting the small creases of your face like around your nose. This brush isn't great for blending which is what I tried to use it for but still very soft natural hair.Contour brush-appears to be made of goat hair as well. This brush is angled and good enough for blush but again not the best blender unfortunately.Foundation brush-synthetic-I am not a fan of foundation brushes and prefer to use my hands or a sponge but if you do like foundation brushes you'll love this one! Very firm but very soft and it's synthetic so it won't absorb your cream, also very dense. Great brush.Powder brush-appears to be goat hair-This brush as mentioned before like them all is travel sized and I'm not really a fan of the smaller sized brush as I prefer large powder/buffer brushes. My favorite is Real techniques. Eco tools also makes a very large bronzer/powder brush. But that's just my preference.Overall a good brush set just make sure the size is the size you're looking for.

This is a very straightforward amp. It has no buttons and no settings. It also doubles over as a headphone splitter with two headphone jacks if you choose to use it that way. The amp does what amps should, amplifies the music. You'll notice a drastic increase in volume and in the bass though it isn't quite boomy you'll notice it can be slightly overpowering. The highs and mids are still present so that isn't anything to worry about. With certain types of headphones this works wonderfully. I noticed in particular a drastic improvement in my Brainwavzn R1 dual driver earbuds which I had not been that impressed with before. I also noticed an improvement in my beats studios and monoprice over ear headphones to name a few others. I wouldn't necessarily recommend this with warm sounding headphones as I don't think the amplification would be an improvement.As I said there are no buttons on this amp, it automatically powers on and off in response to music. When it is on there is a blue light in the middle and when it is plugged in and charging (with a basic micro usb) there is an orange light on that shuts off when it is finished charging. This little guy has a fairly long battery life and about 2 hours of charging gives it around 10 hours of music playing. It's well built I haven't noticed any scratches or damage to it despite a fair amount of use thus far. If I had one improvement I would add a little slot onto the amp or a clip on the back so that it can either be hung or clipped to something.The cable that comes with this is TERRIBLE. I believe I received a defective one....if not they are very poorly and cheaply made. I am still waiting to hopefully receive a replacement from MP4NATION though I have not heard back from them yet and will be back to raise or lower the star rating depending on whether or not I hear back from them. The cable sends very loud static though the amp and headphones whenever it is touched or moved and makes the amp unusable with the included cable so I have been using my own.As stated this is a one feature amp, there is no neutral or mid boost setting. It also does not come with any instructions at all so that should be a sign of how basic the amp is. Just a plug in and listen. I greatly enjoy this amp and the simplicity of it and I love the something extra it adds to certain headphones.UPDATE*** Okay so I returned this amp awhile ago for a whole new replacement and the cable that came with the replacement was equally as bad so the cable is just very cheaply made. I splurged on a short cardas cable found here CARDAS HPI Audiophile Interconnect Cable Adapter Male 1/8" 3.5mm TRS Mini-Plug that can be used with any amp and the cable fixed all problems with static, any distortion etc. Overall I give the amp 3.5/5 because the cable really needs to be changed.

UPDATE******** Okay so after reading some reviews for these on head-fi and other blogs (I had just read amazon reviews before purchasing) these earbuds NEED to be paired with an amplifier to get the full sound range. HOWEVER you do not need an expensive amp. FiijO's wonderful E6 works perfectly set to the neutral setting (no light on amp) or Brainwavz has their own newly launched amp that works well too.I own the Deltas made by Brainwavz and was so impressed with them that I starting seeking out other earbuds made by them. At double the price of the deltas plus the fact they were dual drivers and the extremely positive reviews I had very high expectations of these, maybe too high. Here is my opinion of them.Out of the box. I HATE the cord. The cord is a reasonably thick sort of cheap plastic that has a ton of memory and permanent kinks in it from being wound up, it also tangles easily. At this price I would have preferred a cloth covered cord which has no memory and avoids tangles, the memory in this cord makes it feel kind of cheap. Oh well.It comes with 3 sets of basic earbud sizes, a single triangular shaped earbud pair and medium comply foam tips (the best) and two adapters (very nice). It also comes with a hard case. I love this hard case and it is rock solid and protective and so few earbuds nowadays come with a hard case most just come with a little baggy.Aside from the cord the build quality feels okay, it is entirely plastic with no aluminum or metal casing like the deltas but not cheap feeling plastic. The earbuds sit in your ear and a bendable wire strings over the back of your ear and is adjustable to tighten and hold the earbuds in place. I have smaller ears and this has been as issue for me. It is difficult for me to tighten these enough to hold them in place and often they are rather loose. I have experimented with the different earbuds but a tighter fit does not seem to make a difference.The sound quality for these is good for their price but I don't think I would be willing to pay more for them. I burned these in for close to 100 hours before truly testing the quality. As others have mentioned they are not neutral and are warm in sound. I don't mind warm headphones as they can sound beautiful and natural especially when listening to acoustics but these headphones are very veryyyy warm. I would never call them "muddy" or bad in sound but they are kind of murky and one reviewer described them as "dark" which I think is the perfect word. They are more biased toward the mids especially bass wise and the bass tends to overpower most everything else making the highs nothing really special. If you are looking for a clearer, more leveled sound TTPOD makes some outstanding earbuds in this same price range.I think these are nice dual driver earbuds for the price but I'm not sure I would equate them to those by shure or westone (or even some of monsters) but the price reflects that. I think these are a bit over hyped but worth checking out if you're looking for an inexpensive pair of IEMS.

I bought these headphones to use with my iphone as a means of a backup pair. As far as talking and answering calls goes they have clear sound quality and I have never had anyone complain of not being able to hear me clearly. While numerous earbuds nowadays come with microphones I wanted to save my nicer ones and buy a cheap pair just to use for calls.I would not recommend these for purely listening to music. They are lacking in clarity of the highs and the bass is not very present or tight. Overall not the clearest or best listening experience, somewhat tinny sounding and lacking big time in range. Monoprice makes a lot of great headphones so if you are looking for purely listening to music check out the 108320, 108322, 109396, all great and at a great price.Also, the build quality to these headphones is ultra cheap plastic.I take very good care of my headphones but still don't see these lasting long. No metal casing like on the other earbuds (except the 820's but their build quality is still a lot better). So in short, only buy to use for the microphone.

I purchased these brushes based on the very positive reviews and that they were recommended by many beauty gurus on youtube. Having had them for a little while they remind me very much of my Coastal Scents 22 Piece Brush Set which I've had for a couple years now and I love. Having said that I don't really think these brushes are worth $50 when compared to Coastal scents brushes for $35 but I will go over the pros and cons to see if these brushes are for you.Pros:Nice metal ferrule and wood handles. The black and red of the brush set is also attractive. The wood handles are pouras to the touch, not sleek just to be noted.You have pretty much all the different types of brushes you would need here to create a nice look. This is a good set, especially for beginners.Nice, long full sized handles for easy and ergonomically correct application.All came nicely and individually packaged.Cons:The case is a nice, stiff pleather however the red sewing looks very cheap and tacky and in a few places is coming undone on my case so I was a bit disappointed here.The vast majority of these brushes are synthetic with about 3 goat hair brushes and 1 pony hair eye brush. At this price I would have liked more natural hair brushes, especially more in the eye brushes. Coastal scents brush set has many more natural hair brushes and they are all listed in the description of the product.When I first washed these brushes a few hairs came out here and there on some of them (no big deal) however the face brushes and especially the large fan brush had a decent amount of shedding that surprised me. There has been no shedding when using the brushes however.The synthetic brushes (most of this set) are very stiff feeling when applying makeup, They pick up makeup well but you apply a fair amount of pressure to apply the makeup to your face.Overall I think it is worth checking out Coastal Scents brush set before purchasing this as I think it is a better value for your money.

Breaking Bailey‚Äôs Rules is another excellent addition to the Westmoreland Series. I‚Äôve always wondered what kind of man would win the heart of the youngest female Westmoreland and now I know. I adored both characters, their sizzling attraction to each other, and the feelings I felt while reading.I adored Bailey. She‚Äôs sassy, curses like a sailor, and isn‚Äôt afraid to step up to the plate when needed. She also loves her family and where she comes from very much. To me, Walker was a perfect match for her.Brenda Jackson continues to shine. I won‚Äôt spoil anything, but if you‚Äôre a fan of the author and have read the previous Westmoreland books, don‚Äôt miss out on this one! We‚Äôre introduced to the Outlaws, plus Bane makes an appearance‚Ä¶.and just wait to hear the bomb he drops on Dillon towards the end.

My So-Called Life by J.D. Hollyfield is book 3 in the Love Not Included Series but can be read as a standalone.Christina is an art dealer in California, where she makes good money, but one phone call brings life crashing down for her. Christina must return to her home town after learning that her sister has died. If that wasn‚Äôt bad enough, we learn that Christina has a four-year‚Äã niece who she needs to take care of. Of course when she gets back home, she realizes she‚Äôll have help. The first man she‚Äôs ever loved and the only man she‚Äôs ever loved, will be there to help her.I adored Ian. He‚Äôs loved Christina from the very beginning and when Christina left, he still loved her‚Ä¶just at a distance. He knew she was the only woman for him. He‚Äôs dreamy and so perfect!The story itself is hard to put down and is filled with humor. My So-Called Life is a very enjoyable read that will give you the feels.  Reviewed by Jennifer for MNP!

Three Nights Before Christmas by Kat Latham is definitely a recommended read. I‚Äôve just added this to my favorite list!I don‚Äôt even know where to begin. Lacey and Austin are two people with a complicated situation hanging over their heads. Three years ago Austin arrested Lacey and his testimony sent her to prison. Now she‚Äôs out on parole. They both live in a small town, so there is no staying away from each other, especially when Lacey is helping her brother at his Christmas Tree Farm.I love Lacey. Before she arrested, she was a train engineer. She‚Äôs strong, not afraid to speak her mind, and knows exactly what she wants. I loved how she stood up to Austin and just how honest she was. Not to mention how forgiving she was!Austin is in a tough situation. Being attracted to the same woman who you sent to prison has to be tough. But he stands by his decision‚Ä¶until he needs Lacey‚Äôs help and realizes what he thought he knew about her was wrong.I loved the many emotions that played out in the story and the unexpected twists and turns the story takes you on.Three Nights Before Christmas needs be on everyone‚Äôs holiday read list!!! A must read for sure!

One Touch More is another great read from Mandy Baxter. This is book 3 in the U.S. Marshall Series but can be read as a standalone.Tabitha and Parker are hot together. He's the bad boy she craves. She's the good girl but in a bad position. They both are hiding secrets from each other and when the sh*t hits the fan, will they be able to get past everything?The storyline and the characters kept my attention until the last page and I would definitely recommend this book to anyone who loves their romance with substance.

Racing Hearts is sweet and light and has enough romance to keep you smiling. The story is well-written, the characters are fully developed and the story will pull you in from the beginning.I loved Emery. It‚Äôs not every day we see or read about a female jockey. Emery had an accident and has been out of commission for a while. Her parents are against her riding again, but she needs to ride, just like she needs to breathe. The only person who can help her is Trip.Trip and Emery have a history together. Life tore them apart, but the chemistry between them has never faded.‚ÄúEight years has passed, yet somehow it felt like nothing more than a moment, a breath, a blink, and then she stood there in front of him again.‚ÄùTrip and Emery had me rooting for them from the very start. If you love second chances and small town romances, definitely pick this book up!

Sex, Secrets and Happily Ever Afters by Deb Julienne, is book two in the Twister Sisters Club but can be read as a standalone. If you‚Äôve read the first book then you probably recognize our main characters, Travis and Angel. This is their story.Travis has a habit of putting everyone else before him. With Angel, he feels like he can let go and be himself. He‚Äôs attracted to her and wants to get to know her better, if only Angel would lighten up and let him.Angel isn‚Äôt looking for a relationship and being near Travis makes her nervous. She‚Äôs feeling things she didn‚Äôt believe was possible, especially with Travis. Angel‚Äôs heart has been broken too many times and trust doesn‚Äôt come easy. Can Travis knock down her walls?Sex, Secrets and Happily Ever Afters is a fun read with many amusing lines. There is enough of drama to keep your interests peaked and plenty of romance to make you swoon. Travis and Angel are definitely a couple you want to meet.

Sex, Lies, and Beauty Aids by Deb Julienne will have you smiling in no time. The characters are charming and lovable.Sabrina writes the Natural Beauty Secrets column for the magazine, but little does she know that things are about to change. There are a few major changes happening at the magazine and Sabrina better get ready for them. First, there is a new guy in charge. Second, she must take over the love and sex column or lose or job and third‚Ä¶not everyone is who they say they are.Travis is taking over the magazine for the time being‚Ä¶only Travis isn‚Äôt who he appears to be. Nope, it‚Äôs Trent, his twin brother. The same Trent who Sabrina has a crush on. Trent has to pretend to be Travis, but how long can he assume his brother‚Äôs identity before Sabrina catches on.Sex, Lies, and Beauty Aids had me laughing and smiling at the amusing antics in the story. The romance is sweet and the ending had me sighing. It was truly an enjoyable read. Can‚Äôt wait to read the next book!

Playing with Fire by Alison Bliss is the second book in the Tangled in Texas Series and if you‚Äôve read the first book then you NEED to read this book. For those that haven‚Äôt read the first book in the series, Rules of Protection‚Ä¶shame on you for missing such an awesome book, but that‚Äôs ok because Playing with Fire can be read as a standalone.Whenever I read a book I always bookmark my favorite lines or scenes and after I finished reading Playing with Fire, I went back to check out what I bookmarked, only to find out I bookmarked practically the whole dang story. Close to ninety-five percent of this book was bookmarked‚Ä¶this never happens. I usually only bookmark a page or two, but this book was so amazing that almost every line was my favorite.Cowboy has a reputation. He‚Äôs what they call a lady killer. He can charm the panties off any woman in his vicinity. But he has his work cut out for him when he sets his sights on Anna. Anna knows his reputation and tries to rebuff his advances. But it‚Äôs only a matter of time before Cowboy steals her heart and yours!I adored Anna. We share a kindred spirit. One of the many things we have in common is her love of books.‚ÄúEven as a child, I‚Äôd always spend more time in a library than my own home. It was the one place I felt safe.‚ÄùKudos to Bliss for making me connect with Anna from the very beginning.Bliss exceeded my expectations for this book and I‚Äôd never thought I‚Äôd say this but Cowboy and Anna outshine Jake and Emily. Playing with Fire is definitely one of my favorite reads for 2015 and I bet it will be yours as well. Alison Bliss has outdone herself with this page-turner and I can‚Äôt wait to see what she has in store for us in the future.

Unwrapping Her Perfect Match by Kat Latham is a cute story that will get you into the holiday season in no time.Gwen attends the rugby fundraising auction, only because her sister begs her to bid on her boyfriend for her, but John needs Gwen to bid on him. John was very persuasive and had I been there, I would have bid on him too.Gwen is tall. Her height has been her downfall, but when she meets John, she feels normal. Gwen doesn‚Äôt really have relationships after what happened to her when she was younger, so John has his work cut out for him‚Ä¶but don‚Äôt worry, the big man can handle it.There were some funny moments and then there were moments that had me sighing. If you‚Äôre a rugby fan, a romance lover, or just appreciate good writing, then make this your next read.

Life Next Door is the second book in the Love Not Include series. I fell in love with the first book, so I had high hopes for this one.Priscilla and Trent missed the mark for me. The characters had their good moments, but most of the time I was left shaking my head. The book does include some funny moments and the characters are fully developed, but I couldn‚Äôt really connect with either character.I will say that the ending is really a jaw dropping one. Finding out who Trent really is and who he‚Äôs related to‚Ä¶well that definitely needs wine.Life Next Door by J.D. Hollyfield, has humor, a lot of anger, and few incredulous moments but overall is a good read. Reviewed by Jennifer for MNP.

Matched by Jamie Farrell is book two in the Misfit Brides of Bliss series and can be read as a standalone for those that haven‚Äôt read the first book. But trust me, you will want to grab the whole series!Matched revolves around Lindsey and Will getting a second chance at love. Lindsey and Will fell in love 15 years ago and all it took was one week for their feelings to set in. But, Lindsey is what you would call a matchmaker. She has this intuition about ‚Äúbad matches‚Äù and decides to break up with Will by telling him they are a bad match. Will goes on to become a top rated country music star and Lindsey becomes a divorce lawyer. They never forgot about each other though!Will makes an appearance at Lindsey‚Äôs sisters wedding and they finally see each other again. All the feelings and emotions come back and one thing is for sure, their chemistry is still as explosive as it was 15 years ago.I adored Matched!!! Once I started it, I couldn‚Äôt put it down. Matched is a heartwarming story about accepting and believing in yourself. Lindsey and Will are a must read!

Naughty, exciting and legendary. Those are the words that I would use to describe the Seven Sins anthology. This box set has something for everyone. An arousing doctor, a sensual CEO, a sexy bartender, desirable biker, wicked stepbrother, tempting billionaire and a very hot baseball player. Even though each of the seven stories is a quick read, they each leave an impression. This is one of the best anthologies I‚Äôve read and will recommend it to anyone who likes their romance on the wild side.Blaze for Me is the first book I‚Äôve read from Natalie Andersen and it won‚Äôt be the last. In fact, I‚Äôve just added her Beg for Me series to my tbr list! To say I was impressed with her writing is an understatement. I loved her characters!!! Austin and Nicoletta were two characters that showed a great deal of passion and that passion came through the pages. A 5 star read!Glutton for Punishment by Amy Andrews made me laugh more than once. The banter between Darcy and Mitch was amusing and playful. I immediately fell in love with the two spirited characters. 4.5 stars!Burned by Lust from Michele de Winton definitely earned its title! Both characters were sizzling hot. I especially enjoyed Lee‚Äôs character. She is such a spitfire. Doesn‚Äôt take nothing from nobody and knows how to handle her business. She knows what she wants and takes it. I only wish we had more of a backstory with her character. 4 stars!Sleeping with the Enemy is everything I love about romance. Robin Covington definitely knows how to write amazing characters who are genuine and can make you feel something. Derek and Kat had chemistry in spades and I adored their story. 5 stars!Princess Sin by Avery Flynn had me rooting for Cyn and Hunter right from the beginning. This story is packed with emotion, but don‚Äôt worry there are plenty of sexy times. I only wish there was little more to Cyn, apart from her rich, party girl persona. Princess Sin is fast paced and completely enjoyable. 4 stars!Falcone kept my eyes eager and my cheeks flushed with excitement as I devoured Accidentally Sinful. I‚Äôll be honest, I was leery going into the story. I‚Äôve read more than a few of the stepbrother romances and I‚Äôve never really enjoyed them. Carmen Falcone has done the unthinkable‚Ä¶she made me LOVE this stepbrother romance! This was hands down my favorite out of the set. Accidentally Sinful has it all‚Ä¶angst, hunger, secrets and plenty of sin to keep you yearning for more. Carmen Falcone shines with this brilliant 5-star read!I love my heroines strong and accomplished and Talia Hunter provided me with exactly that in How to Seduce a CEO. Angel knows exactly what she wants and only Marcus can give it to her. I thoroughly enjoyed reading about Angel and Marcus and I am so happy how the end turned out. Sexy yet sweet with 4.5 stars!Stop reading this review and buy this anthology now!!!!
I love this journal. It's a great way for me to keep my book reviews in order. Will be buying more soon!

Life in a Rut, Love Not Included by J.D. Hollyfield is a must read romance. This is the first book I‚Äôve read by this author and I will definitely be reading her other titles.Life in a Rut, Love Not Included is so refreshing. It was different from the other romances I normally read. The romance is sweet and sexy. The dialogue is witty and will keep you turning the pages and the characters will steal your heart! How Forever Feels by Laura Drewry is definitely a must read. Her whole series is one that I highly recommend.Jack is adorable. He will steal the spotlight and make you wish you were in Maya‚Äôs shoes. I‚Äôm so glad these two have each other! Jack and Maya will leave you smiling and a little envious of their relationship.How Forever Feels contains plenty of romance, lovable characters, and will keep you entertained throughout the story. A definite keeper!!

An attorney and a reporter fight for control in this fast-paced, well-developed, one of a kind romance. Blue Blooded will take you on an amazing journey filled with sex, intrigue, and suspense. Highly recommended!

Snowflake Wishes by Maggie McGinnis is another amazing read by this author!! Noah and Piper are two wonderful people who get a second chance at romance. They've been apart for seven years, but nothing has changed. The love they feel for each other is still there and hasn't weakened. In fact, it's stronger this time around. This time, there is no going back.Heartwarming characters, a love like no other, and well-written words that you will lose yourself in. Snowflake Wishes will get you into the holiday spirit within a few pages.I highly recommend this book and this author!

All I Need is You is book two in the Loving You Series and is full of emotion, conflict, and misunderstandings. Two people who start out as pen pals but emerge as much more. Neve and Rory were complicated and not without their faults, but there is no denying their attraction to one another. Another enjoyable read from Wendy S. Marcus.

Jake Volume 2 picks up right where the last one stopped. I enjoyed this book a little more than the first one, because it had more substance to it. Jake is still the same guy he was in the first book, only he‚Äôs allowing Addi to creep into his life.Jake surprised me in this story. He went out of his way to find something that truly means a lot to Addi and he did it without expecting anything.I really like Addi. The way she handles Jake is completely awesome. She doesn‚Äôt give an inch! I can‚Äôt wait to see what‚Äôs next for these two!If you‚Äôve read the first book then definitely purchase this one. I find it very interesting reading about Jake and his life. Besides‚Ä¶the sex is hot! Reviewed by Jennifer from MNP!

I‚Äôm definitely not a prude, but there was too much sex in here. Omg‚Ä¶I never thought I would say that, but in this case it‚Äôs true. Jake is a manwhore. Seriously!! The opening scene is a threesome with two women, then not long after that he‚Äôs getting a blow job from a customer and so on. To say Jake gets plenty of sex, is an understatement.I did enjoy the cover of the book. The writing was easy to read and for me, this story was one that I had to finish. It‚Äôs one of things that you just can‚Äôt look away from. I had to find out if Jake was going to change his ways or something along those lines.Nope‚Ä¶no changing his ways, but since this is only volume 1, there still is time. I did enjoy getting to know Addi a little.  I think Jake met his match with this one!If you enjoy hot meaningless sex, then definitely check this story out. I will definitely be checking out the next book to see what happens with Jake and Addi. Reviewed by Jennifer for MNP!

The Naughty List is an enjoyable read that is‚Ä¶.. naughty!This story revolves around three best friends who are business partners. Lacey, Ry and Bram. Bram and Ry have been in love with Lacey for a while now, both agree not to do anything about it, because it would damage their friendship. Lacey is a good girl and when someone calls her boring she decides to make a list‚Ä¶yep, she makes a naughty list.The list includes some really sexy things, including a threesome. Suffice to say the scenes are hot and Bram and Ry do their best at checking everything off on Lacey‚Äôs list.I really enjoyed the emotion towards Lacey between the guys. You could tell how much they loved her and how much they wanted to fight for a relationship between them. Overall this was a quick yet satisfying read.

The final book in the Hard Ink Series ends with a bang. All loose ends are tied up and the men get what they deserve‚Ä¶the good guys and the bad! Redemption has never felt so good!!! If I had the power to give this book more than 5 stars I would.Hard to Let Go revolves around Kat and Beckett. HOLY MOLY‚Ä¶these two are hot for each other. The chemistry between these two just keeps building, until they have no choice, but make a move for each other. There are definitely reasons why a relationship shouldn‚Äôt be pursued. First, she‚Äôs Nick‚Äôs sister. Second, nobody is safe and third, they both have issues. They both understand this, but when love is involved, all bets are off!The thing with Laura Kaye, is that she writes real emotions and her characters deal with real issues. Serious issues that aren‚Äôt glossed over, but faced full on. This is one of the reasons why she is an auto-buy author for me.This book is filled with steamy scenes, romance at its finest, and pure action that will keep you GLUED to the pages.This whole series is beyond amazing and I will definitely be re-reading it all over again, when I get the chance.

Flirting with Disaster is a quick read that was entertaining at times. I enjoyed the storyline and the dual point of views provided a great insight into the characters heads and their hearts.Barbara comes back to her hometown a changed person. She‚Äôs successful and she‚Äôs made something of herself. She uses a different name, so no one recognizes her. The reason Barbara is in town, makes her an enemy to most of the town, especially Ryder and his family. Barbara and Ryder‚Äôs relationship isn‚Äôt smooth much of the time, but when they realize how much the other means to them, there is no stopping them. The love they have for each other trumps anything else going on at the moment.The only thing in the story that bothered me was Ryder in the beginning. He kept concentrating on Barbara‚Äôs looks a little too much, especially about her jiggly butt. We hear all about how he‚Äôs used to small women with firm butts and how he doesn‚Äôt understand why he‚Äôs getting turned on by Barbara. He gets better though and I love how he falls hard for her, jiggly butt included.The drama in the story will keep you interested and readers will be invested in the outcome of Barbara and Ryder‚Äôs relationship.

Sworn to Protect is an amazing addition to Katie Reus‚Äôs Red Security Series. I can honestly say that this book kept my attention from the very beginning. It has everything you could want in a story. Hot romance, action, suspense, and characters that you will fall in love with.Quinn and Athena‚Äôs relationship started off great until she dropped the V-word and what did Quinn do‚Ä¶he ran away. Don‚Äôt worry they meet again, but unexpectedly. Turns out Athena‚Äôs new job will bring her straight to Quinn. As they work together their attraction gets hotter and this time there is no running away.I really liked Athena. She was a strong heroine. What I really loved about her was how she turned Quinn down initially, when he wanted a second chance.Quinn is sexy and protective. When he realizes he wants a second chance, nothing will stop him. He definitely makes up for leaving Quinn in the beginning!I love Katie Reus and love this series! A Must Read!

The Seals of Summer 2 Box set is incredible. Readers will not want to miss out on such a good deal!! So many amazing stories packed into one awesome box set!!!For this review, I will be concentrating on Fall Dark by Zoe York and A Seal‚Äôs Chance by Cora Seton. Both of these stories are hot, amazing, and truly worth your time.Fall Dark revolves around Vince and Larken. I loved both of these characters. To be honest, I haven‚Äôt found a character created by Zoe York that I haven‚Äôt liked, but that just proves what an amazing author she really is. Vince and Larken are given a second chance in this book, but only if they are willing to put the past behind them and move forward. Can they do it? Vince and Larken are great characters and I loved how I felt when they were together. Second chance romances aren‚Äôt my favorite trope, but Zoe York made me believe in her characters and made me love this story!A Seal‚Äôs Chance revolves around Ben and Caitlyn. This was a really sweet story that really captured the emotions of a single mother and man who believes he‚Äôs damaged. The attraction between the characters is strong, but is it enough for the relationship to really work out? I really enjoyed this story and couldn‚Äôt stop reading until I knew what was going to happen with Caitlyn and Ben.

Romancing the Alpha Box set is full of action and adventure. It‚Äôs also a very good deal! You get 10, never before published books for one low price!! It‚Äô a STEAL!!!For this review, I am going to concentrate on my two favorites. Fall Back by Zoe York and Her Treasure Hunter Ex by Zara Keane. Both are amazing stories that you will want to re-read over and over again.Readers will fall in love with Cade and Mel from Fall Back. These characters keep you on your toes from the start. Cade has his work cut out for him, but this SEAL knows how to get things done. Zoe York is a favorite author of mine and her stories shouldn‚Äôt be missed!Katy and Dex from Her Treasure Hunter Ex are such fun characters that will keep you entertained. The story is well-written and will keep you interested from the very beginning. The second chance romance is done right and the characters are ones you will be rooting for.This box set is a must buy for anyone who loves a good romance, especially ones with hot alphas that make you drool!!!

I received this book as a gift in exchange for an honest review.Leaving Me Behind by Sigal Ehrlich is a very deep and soul searching read. I believe many people can relate to wanting to get up and leave their mundane life and try something new. Liv does what many people only wish they can do. She leaves her comfortable life behind and moves to Spain for a year.Eventually Liv makes new friends and connections in Spain. Speaking of connections, she meets Sebastian, this very hot guy, who she accidentally flashes. Sebastian keeps turning up where Liv is and the attraction between them is unstoppable. They have to have each other and they do‚Ä¶.repeatedly. I really enjoyed Sebastian as a character and I wish more men acted like him. He said what was on his mind and called out Liv when she needed it.The sex scenes are well done and very hot. The emotions between the characters are noticeable, to where readers aren‚Äôt left guessing why they should be together. You can definitely tell that Liv and Sebastian belong together. The storyline is intriguing and will keep you entertained. The secondary characters only add to the story and I think the cover of this book really nailed the story. I would recommend this book to anyone who enjoys a good romance. Reviewed by Jennifer for MNP.

The storyline is intriguing, the characters are fully developed, and not once did I want to put this book down. It‚Äôs not very often that a story captures my full attention, but Take Me, did just that. The twists and turns in this story will have you on the edge of your seat.Peyton and Gabe have a complicated history and when they meet up again, it only becomes more complex. It turns out that both Peyton and Gabe have some secrets that need to come forward. Peyton finds out Gabe has a twin brother, one who he shares women with, and Gabe finds out that their one night together, seven years ago, produced a son.There is so much emotion to this story that it will take you by surprise. I felt what the characters were going through. Abandonment, failure, uselessness‚Ä¶just some of the gripping emotions going on.‚ÄúWhat about forgiveness? Can it always be worked out? Because some days it feels possible, and sometimes it feels like a mountain I just don‚Äôt have the strength to climb.‚ÄùBut then you also have moments where the characters are filled with passion, heat, and most importantly, an overwhelming love that people would do anything for.Peyton is some instances is very lucky. It doesn‚Äôt seem that way in the beginning, because all the heartache and grief she‚Äôs had to endure, but when Sam and Gabe step up and decide that she is theirs‚Ä¶.well, like I said she is one lucky lady.If I had the option of giving this book more than five stars, I would. Take Me is definitely a recommended read and is one of the top reads I have read this year! This is one book I will be re-reading many times over.

Once Upon a Cowboy is book three in the Whisper Creek series and just like the previous two books this is a must read. Maggie McGinnis created yet another five star masterpiece, that leaves me anticipating her next book. Each book keeps getting better and better, to where I am in awe of her talent. Maggie McGinnis is definitely an author to add to your must read list. Once Upon a Cowboy will keep you turning the pages with the detailed descriptions, the well-written scenes, and the emotional detail that went it to crafting this book. Speaking of emotions, this reader will admit to needing a few tissues to get through the not so fun times, but if you've read from this author before then you can expect a happy ending. The flashbacks in the story are completely gut-wrenching and will leave you saddened for the character and wishing you could take away their pain, but when the story comes back to the present, you will once again feel the warmth and excitement that comes with a Maggie McGinnis novel. The characters are strong, capable, and will have you engrossed in their life in a matter of minutes. To the author....if you are reading this, the ending was absolutely perfect, thank you for writing an amazing series.

Great quality Sentey Tyon Headphones. These come professionally packaged and would make a perfect gift! At this price point, these headphones are a great deal.At first, I was a little confused how these were supposed to fit well in the ear. I quickly figured out that the speaker (ear piece part) goes in your ear almost upside down since the wire is to go around your ear and not down your body first. Hope that makes sense. This is the second set of CraftyCroc Chalk Markers I have, as the other set is of the brightly colored ones. I do LOVE these Earthy Fall Colors as they are perfect for fall themes and Thanksgiving too!When you first get these markers, you will have to prime them the first time you use them. In order to do this, you will need to take off the cap and with the tip upright and then you will press it gently to release the pressure and you can usually hear the air release. Next, you will put the cap back on and shake with the pen upright. Then you will press the tip all the way down onto a piece of paper until the tip fills with ink. So I have tried this VIIcode Oxygen Eye Mask for 2 times now and have seen some positive changes. First of all, I was contacted by the seller and was given the opportunity to try this mask out for review purposes. However, this listing is for 6 boxes and I received 1 box and a very small tube of the eye cream. This was ok since it was enough to try it out and see what results I could have with this product.I was skeptical at first since this product is to be worn ALL night long. I do sleep on my stomach and on my side so I was concerned about whether this eye mask would even stay on. Well, the eye mask did stay put and so that was good....however, it does feel weird to have something around your eye sockets all night long. Both times I used this, I had the eye mask on for about 5 hours until it annoyed me and woke me up and then I just took them off.So the good part....The eye masks are very cooling when you put them on. When I did remove them, a little of the gel remained under my eye but I just patted it in and everything was fine. When looking in the mirror in the morning, I did notice a smoothing of the fine lines that I do have (I am 41 so they are starting to be evident). Also on a postive note, the feeling of the under eye skin was super soft and hydrated looking. All of this is very good, however a few days later there was no real change until you would put the mask on again.Overall, I really do like what it did for my eyes. I think it would be great when you have a special event the next day or pictures that need to be taken. Long term, I am not sure what it really is accomplishing and for this price point it needs to do more. I think that they need to come up with a better, more efficient application process since wearing the masks all night is not working for me.I received this product as a sample for unbiased review.
