I wasn't sure about this OrganicRaw Yacon Syrup at first. I mean, I wasn't really sure what a Yacon was to be honest. So I did a little research and found out that adding this to my diet was one of the easiest and simplest ways to help jump start my weight loss. Here's just a little of what I learned about this miracle vegetable:Yacon syrup is extracted from the roots of the Yacon plant, which looks just like a sweet potato. The Yacon plant grows natively in the Andes mountains in South America.This plant has been eaten and used for medicinal purposes for hundreds of years in South America. People there believed it to have powerful medicinal properties, leading to improvements in diabetes and helping with kidney and digestive disorders.Because a large part of Yacon syrup isn‚Äôt digested, it has only a third of the caloric value of sugar. For this reason, it can be used as a low-calorie alternative to sugar. When the active ingredients in Yacon syrup reach the large intestine, they feed the friendly bacteria in the digestive system. This is where Yacon syrup works its magic‚Ä¶ in the gut. The friendly bacteria in the gut are actually incredibly important for the health of our bodies. Having the ‚Äúright‚Äù types is associated with a lower risk of diabetes, better immunity and improved brain function‚Ä¶ to name a few.When the bacteria digest the Yacon syrup they also produce short-chain fatty acids that have powerful anti-obesity effects, at least in rats. There is also some evidence that Yacon syrup can lower the hunger hormone ghrelin, helping to reduce appetite.What I love about this Yacon syrup from Peak Fusion is that this taste no different from molasses. So if you're hesitant about the taste like I was, please don't let that hold you back. When you add it to recipes, you really don't notice the taste except it adds a bit of sweetness. My favorite way to consume the Yacon Syrup is to add it to a smoothie since I drink one every morning and it's just sort of a no brainer. The receipe is:- 3 cups raspberries- 1/4 cup spinach- 1‚ÅÑ2 cup Greek yogurt- 1 teaspoon Peak Fusion Platinum Yacon Syrup- ice to thickenAnd it's that easy! I have noticed that my energy is higher than it was and that I don't crave sweets like I used to. Also I'm not as hungry as I used to be - once I eat I feel fuller longer which has helped me cut on my snaking. I'm not one for the scale but I have noticed that within the month of using this that my clothes don't feel as restricting as they used to! I haven't really actively try to change my diet and exercise but I bet if I did I would see some decent weight loss! I did receive this product for free in exchange that I give my honest, unbiased review.

I run a busy Recording Studio and own many microphone stands.  The best microphone stands are those that you can put up and take down easily as you are needing to change out your equipment for another record session.  This is why I give this product 5 stars. I love this Microphone Stand!  In a busy situation with lots of continual setup you need to save time.This Stand is a lot more solid than the $20-$30 microphone stands that are out there.... so it certainly worth the price.  Period.There are usually 5 spots on any Microphone Stand that are necessary to adjust for the right height to record an instrument.  When setting up a stand I start from the bottom and move up.  This stand has 6 adjustments!-The bottom adjustment on this stand has a soft and much larger adjustment twist clamp that works quite beautifully.  Most cheaper stands have a screw type adjustment that takes a "ton" of time to adjust.-The 2nd adjustment on this stand is a rubberized clutch handle that you only have to use one hand to adjust the top part of the stand.  Normally on other Stands to tighten this you will need two to four turns... with this handle one turn is -enough to test out the height.  The second turn tightens it perfectly.-The 3rd adjustment is the Boom part of the stand.  Again, to adjust this there is a nice rubber twist clamp instead of the screw type of clamp that takes "forever" to adjust.-The 4th, 5th and 6th adjustments are the final boom part of the stand which is the most important. There is a screw that easily adjusts to extend the arm out and then there are two other screws, (where there is normally only one more), one that tightens the boom all the way out where you need it, and then the last one that you can tighten AFTER you have used it to turn around and around to attach your clip or microphone mount.  This is truly why I love this stand!!!!I have also found it much easier to wrap my microphone cords around this stand, especially the boom part of the stand, and the bottom legs of the stand are solid and the base is MUCH bigger than cheaper stands.This stand is well built, super sturdy and I will order another one.  I will then use these two stands to record my upright piano and it is perfect!!

This is a super soft and very well made Doll (Teaching Toy) called "Kira." It is part of a product line created by the well known Pop Star Singer ‚ÄúShakira‚Äù for her Barefoot Foundation to raise money for the impoverished areas in Latin America.  I like this Cat Doll.I recommend that before you start using it, make sure you adjust the sound control behind the velcro flaps in the back of the toy.  Open the flaps and remove it from of "Demo" mode, by moving the button to the middle selection of the 3 different modes.  This is soft mode, all the way down is loud mode, which you really don‚Äôt want.  This Learning Toy can be somewhat loud.Pressing the bottom of the left foot turns the device ON/OFF.  Make sure you do this to save on the batteries.  I did not see this until after I had the doll for a couple of weeks. Every time I moved it, it sang or giggled.  Turning it off is good and saves batteries.  It takes 3 AA batteries.Also, You must exchange the batteries the doll comes with.  The instructions say the included batteries are only for demonstration purposes only.  The batteries do work, and I exchanged them out, but didn‚Äôt see any difference with how the doll performed.The toy doesn't come with a very detailed instruction book, so I did a lot of guessing about how it would work. Here is what I came to.There are 4 Activation points on the doll.1. Pressing the left foot after (you turn it on) only makes the doll laugh, and turns the doll on and off.2. Pressing and HOLDING on the heart in the middle of the chest plays through ALL the songs.  I counted about 10 complete songs.3. Pressing the dolls right paw takes you through learning songs, like the ABCs that you can sing with, and this selection is instrumental music only.  There are about 4 songs here.4. Pressing the left paw are songs with lyrics.  The Doll giggles periodically after songs too.  There are about 4 songs on this paw.The songs do alternate between English and Spanish.  You can hear a sample of the voice of the doll on the top of this page.  It is a good sample of the vibe of the doll.It is marketed as bi-lingual but I don‚Äôt get a lot of that.  There are a few phrases but NOT a lot of Spanish.  I was expecting more.  But for a child under 5 years old, this is a great doll.

After a year (outside) in the elements the Label has completely faded and I just cannot read what color the paint is in the can.These Labels are Perfect!!  They really stand up to the harsh elements outside and it is literally impossible to rub off the ink!  I soaked a jar in water for a couple of weeks with a label on it....they stuck like glue!And, like all Avery products there is a perfect template to download from their website for either your Mac Computer or your PC.  I have both and tested them.  If you have a Mac, download the .doc template and then open it in your Pages Application.  It will convert perfectly for printing.Remember these are ONLY for Laser Printers.  I tried printing them on my inkjet printer and they completely SMEAR!!!  They are a bit pricy, but I don't want to take the time ever again trying to remember just what color is in the Paint Can!!

As a Recording Engineer I find Digital Audio Workstations (or DAW) can be somewhat difficult to review.  Why?  Because having used so many different types Workstations, (Pro Tools, Logic Pro, Ableton,Cubase GarageBand) and also having worked with many different Professional Sound Engineers, what I have learned is that each DAW, as well as each Engineer creates, and over time develops a personal "work flow" that is unique to many of the variables to their ultimate and unique vision with music.  It can also depend on what kind of music you are recording or mixing.  So, there are many variables to consider when spending a lot of money on a DAW.Here is what I found with this program.First you will have to download the software from the Internet and it will take a while.  I suggest that you use an Ethernet Cable instead of a Wireless  Connection for a more stable and faster download.  Expect the software to take at least a DAY to completely download.  This is not unusual.  I have spent this amount of time downloading quite a few DAWS.  That said, you don't HAVE to download EVERYTHING to get started.  You have the option of "checking" the items that you want to download.  To do that.... go to the Studio One Tab and check "Studio One Installation."  Here you can check only the additional items that you want to install and do it within your OWN time.What is different about this DAW?  Essentially the program "looks" the same as Logic and has the same interface "feel" with many of the same components as the other workstations.  It is really a personal preference in the end.  What I do like about this program is that there are a TON of loops and sounds that come with it.  This is why it takes so darn long to download.  And you can "try" this program for free.  You can download the professional Demo from their website too.  You don't get that with other DAWS.  Also, there are a TON of tutorials they provide, and their company and support tis GREAT!! Their website is very clear and user friendly.First thing I suggest you do when you open it is to go the VIEW tab and click on all the windows.  This will give you a good idea of what is available to you within the program.  If this is your first DAW, read the manuals.  A lot.  It takes a long time to understand how to record, edit, mix and master.  But, you can get going fairly quickly within this progam.If you are doing this as a hobby, then buy a Mac and use GarageBand first.  Then upgrade to Logic (which at the time of this review it is $200.)  If you are working to be a professional recording engineer then go straight to Pro Tools and learn that.... because in most Recording Studios that is the Industry standard.  Then try out these different DAWS and decide if you like the interface. I like this interface but it is fairly standard, and of course you may love it.  I would try the FREE version first before you decide to buy this.  Again, Recording Engineers are like Artists, it is important to find the program that best suits you visually and that you can develop a good "work flow" within.

This is a very compact and beautiful little shaver!!  It completely fits in the palm of my hand.  See Photo.This shaver is 4 inches in length and is really well made.  It feels heavy in my hand even though it is so small.  It comes with a plastic protective cap that goes over the top to protect the wet/dry blades.  See Photo.Even though this is for men, I have used it on my legs and it works great.  It is a smooth and seamless shave for me, and my boyfriend loves it!  This is also great little Shaver for TRAVEL.  It uses two AA Batteries and you put the batteries in the bottom of the shaver.  Turn the bottom to the left and the bottom pops off to expose the battery well.Great job Panasonic!  Love it!!

I wish I could just not give this 0 stars because this watch is now worthless...  please read my review....  When I received the watch I was very, very impressed by the beautiful packaging, and the instruction guide.  I was not expecting my next experience.This is a very LARGE woman's watch.  I took it to my local watch repair man to have the links taken out so that it would fit my wrist.  (Yes, I have a very tiny wrist and am used to this). The repair man took out the all the links he could and it still would not fit.  Yikes!!!  Really??  I have other watches that I have done this too. He tried adjusting it.... but alas... It was still too big.  Do not buy this watch if you have small wrists... but read on... there is more....Then I asked the watch repairman to please set the time for me, if he could.  He said, "Well, I wish I could but... this watch is actually broken.  It will not set, the pin just spins around and around.  I am so sorry, maybe you can return it and get your money back."  Having gotten this product through Amazon Vine, this watch is a product that I receive in exchange for compensation for using and reviewing it.  Now I cannot review it.. sigh...  but that is not all.... there is more...I told the watch repairman that I was receiving the watch in compensation for reviewing it on Amazon.  He then said, and I quote, "These are the worst watches on the market.  The company has terrible support.  They are always getting sued by everyone.  The parts are made in China, the parts are NOT Swiss made, but they will say they are... and the company is a bunch of crooks."  My mouth dropped open..  What?  Really?  He was fairly adamant about HIS review. And who am I not to trust someone who works with watches everyday?  But I am not one to "dog" a company when I have not actually had a bad experience..... so....Needless to say, I now have this watch and wish I could return it.  So, I looked inside the directions to see what THAT process is.There is a 1 year warranty on this watch.  You must register the watch on their website, To return the watch for repair, you must send it, along with your copy of you original purchase invoice and a check payable to Invicta Watch in the amount of $28 to cover the cost of shipping, or you can pay that fee on their website for the service order to get started.  This is  for all watches.  And then you must wait 90 days for them to fix the watch...  What?I am super frustrated with this watch.  I don't think I will pay to send it to them quite yet to have them fix it.  It doesn't fit in the first place so I am going to put it away.  I can't imagine that anyone would want to pay another $28 to have a watch fixed that they only bought 4 days ago??Egads...  Save your money.  Buy a watch locally.  And don't buy Invictas.  They seem like a big headache when they don't work.Oh, they do have a phone number you can call from 9-5 EST.  I will do that and report back.

There are a lot of Computer Sleeves out there, and I was very unimpressed when I got this one.  But it all depends on what you are looking for, and what you want.  This is a piece of Neoprene with a zipper.  Thats it.For the price I think you could find something else that would help you to feel more confident with protection of your computer.. I might pay $10 for this, but certainly not $20.This is not padded.. It is ONE layer of Neoprene.  Really?  Why no padding?  There are no pockets.  What?  Why no pockets?  I feel like I could go to the fabric store and buy some Neoprene and put a zipper on it.  HummmmI guess if you are a real Minimalist this would be for you.  Don't wait your time here if you are looking for protection.

I just love this microphone.  I run a small Recording Studio and I bought this microphone based on a review by a seasoned Recording Engineer.  He said you would be surprised by the sound, and that you should have one of these in you Microphone locker.  I gave it a chance and WOW! WOW!! WOW!!For the price, I am super amazed and excited about this product.I now have two of them.  I use them all the time.

This is a great case!  Sturdy, Strong and very, very Durable. The construction on the case is really well done.  It has a handle on the outside for carrying and I can fit a few files in it as well.I use it on mu older MacBook Pro 15 inch Laptop which runs Lion software (5years old) and it holds it perfectly and very securely.  The outer case is super hard and I feel confident putting it inside a bag that is more lightweight and made of fabric.  Makes sense that my Computer is in a hard shell and my bag is in fabric.  Love that.I tried it on my newer MacBook Pro Laptop (3 years old)  and it does not fit at all. Bummed about that.  But I know this is specifically made for Chrome Books, so I wasn't expecting it to fit.What I don't like about this case is that there is no bag on the outside to put cords etc.  That would have made it  a Five star product for me.  But I feel confident that my laptop computer is safe and protected. That is what is great about this product.

This is a beautiful journal that you can hold in your hand.  The magnetic clasp is super strong and I use these for officiating wedding ceremonies.  They are quite stunning in person.They are simple lined which I like in a journal and for note taking.  And there is also a red page holder that can be used to quickly go to the page you are on.For the price, this is a great journey.

As with most Memoirs, this book is about a young woman and her early life story of the tragedy of being raped and the growth after that tragedy. The basic premise is about how she moves out into the world from her very safe and idyllic town of Newton, Massachusetts and into the world.  She writes that she has an overprotective family, two accomplished parents and grew up with plenty of money.  She was also the baby in her family.After her second night of college she is raped.  Devastated she decides to hike the Pacific Crest Trail across California, Oregon and Washington.  From there she describes her trek across the Trail and all the people she meets along the way.I wish I could give this book a better review, but in some parts it reads like a journal, and then there are places where I felt an editor had tried to come in and cleaned it up a bit....  I have to say that Aspen does have some potential writing ability, but I just could not "get into" the story.  It felt a bit "all over the place" and I was not sure of her point.  Even at the end I felt a bit confused. Yes, there is some growth on her trail, but I guess I wanted more.  That said, I just found myself not wanting to finish it.There is some good information about the PCT, and if you are interested in that I suggest you read this book.  This book comes out after the best seller "Wild" which was written by Cheryl Strayed.  That book is an amazing and incredible read with layers of psychological and spiritual wisdom.....  It was hard to not keep thinking about how amazing THAT book was when I was reading this book.  So, maybe I was not the best reviewer for this book.  It lacked some depth for me and I think that is just the authors lack of experience and overprotected childhood.I did give it a chance, and if I am being honest it was a struggle for me to read it.  That said, I am just one person's opinion and you may love this book.  Give it a chance.  The writing is good, not great.  You may find something of interest too, especially if you are thinking of walking the Pacific Coast Trail.

This device is a life-saver in my Recording Studio.  I have been looking for months for a "talk back" system to use with Pro Tools and my Studio...... and this thing is the bomb.  I use 2 sets of speaker with it to switch back and forth to listen to the sound quality.  The dim switch is great for automatically lowering the music in my room when talking to a client, but still having the music on.  Its super easy to use and I love it!!The setup was SO easy that I could hardly believe it.  There are 4 headphone plugins that you can use for mixing.  LOVE THAT!!!  And the level indicator on the front is great.

This is a very well made piece of furniture that you must assemble yourself.  It took me about 40 minutes to put the entire piece together, and the finished product is quite beautiful.  This is NOT your local office (press board) store product, so you will be getting a lot MORE for you money.  It is a piece of furniture that is sturdy and well made.Having assembled a lot of furniture I was ready for about an hours worth of work.  The directions were ok.  There are NO written directions on how to assemble it, only PICTURES. So if you have not assembled furniture before the directions might be challenging.  But ON EACH PAGE of the directions, there is a phone number to call if you get stuck.  They encourage you to call if YOU DO get stuck.  You must study the pictures carefully and understand all the parts before you begin.  Each part is well marked.  In fact each part has both letter AND a number identifying it.  Just in case you get confused, the booklet that comes with the product is fairly clear.  The directions also tell you if you may need an assistant on a certain step.The cubbies are a nice size.  Actually BIGGER then most cubby type furniture.  The wood is a nice mocha brown color that will look nice in any room. I highly recommend this beautiful piece of furniture.

This seems like a good iron.  Its nice looking and works fine.Here are the Pros:Made by Black and Decker. They stand by their products and this one is made true to that standard.Gets really hot!  LOTS and LOTS of steam.  If you are looking for an Iron that produces steam, this is for you!!!!  My Rowena Iron does NOT put out this much steam, at all!!!The place that you add water, on the top of the product is super easy to open and REALLY easy to add water to. The well that holds the water is see-through so you always know if there is water in there, and how much you will need to refill. The buttons that you press are big and right by your thumb.My Iron has two big buttons, not shown in the product picture. Water shoots onto the fabric with the right button, and steam shoots out the left button.  These work great and are right at your "thumb-tips"I have a Rowena Iron that I bought for $100, this has all the same features and is half the price.Automatically shuts off.  Love that!Here are the Cons:I was super amazed at how hot this iron got.  BE really careful with this.  I burned the first t-shirt that I tried with it, and had to scrub the fabric off the front plate.  I was a bit shocked by that.It gives off  a LOT of steam and you can get really HOT while ironing.  Its heavier than my other Iron.  That can be a bummer for some people.  I didn't mind that too much.  My housekeeper didn't like these two things and likes my other iron better because of this.Overall I love this Iron because it gives off a lot of steam.  When I need steam FAST I will use this baby!!!

Rising Strong is both relevant and informative.  Brene Brown has proven (once again) with her newest book that she is committed to providing information that will actually help and heal those of us who are interested in doing the REAL work.  This book comes after having received a lot of success with her book, "Daring Greatly."  Which is .... by the way...  a great book.....  And I Dare to say for sure..... this book is her BEST book yet.  I have numerous pages marked because I want to go back and glean more deeply the concepts that she brings to light in this wonderful read.I liked Daring Greatly.......I LOVE Rising Strong.  Rising Strong is for those individuals who want to know what their REAL work is. Through personal stories within her own life, as well as stories from those she has interviewed with her research, this book provides a TON of Grist for the mill!!  Plowing through our own stories, getting UP after YOU FALL is what this book will help you to do.This book is honest, courageous, brilliantly written, and a book that has opened ME up.....  I will read it again.  And again.  You are going to stumble and fall in life.  Period.  This book helps to bring light to what you will need to do AFTER that happens.  And it will.  It brings light to those of us who WANT to stand up. Who HAVE to stand up.  And this book helps to convey HOW to do that.  How to HELP yourself and see what your STORY is, and how you can change it.As a Spiritual Counselor, I am always looking for books that I can refer to my clients.  This book I have already referred numerous times within my practice.  There are a lot of Self-Help books out there...... most of the time they are very dry, and without any wisdom or ability to emotional present the material in a succinct and grounded way.  This book does all that, and you will want to give it away and tell others about it.Bravo Brene.  I salute your ability to cohesively and coherently broach a subject that is both sensitive and extremely needed in our world.  You are a new hero of mine.  Thank you for writing this fabulous book!ADDITIONAL NOTE ON MY REVIEW .....  I work to write my "Vine Reviews" from my Heart.  After posting this review, I noticed that someone checked that it was "not helpful."  The Fabulous Irony here is that after reading THIS BOOK I now get to "check in" and see whether "I" thought my review was helpful and look to what triggers of shame I may have with my authenticity about writing reviews.  I did just that.  My review stands.I loved this book and think that everyone who wants to RISE STRONG should read this book. Brene teaches reality checking.  She also helps you to work on practicing critical awareness and rethinking expectations that tell us what being imperfect means.  In our world of "likes" and "helpful" or "not-helpful" votes her book will help you to conquer the fears you may have of putting yourself out there.

These are the absolute bomb!  I am a Recording Engineer and wear a lot of headphones.  These are very, very comfortable!!!!! They are extremely compact and definitely noise canceling.  You wouldn't think by just looking at them that they would work to cancel out all noise but when I put them on, my jaw dropped.  I took them off and looked at them.  Put them back on, and was like, Wow!!!  I couldn't hear a sound!!!Then when I plug them into my computer and put music on..... Double WOW!!  There is a strong bass sound that comes through these that I can feel in my head.  The music sounds warm and beautiful.  And my husband has had to come over and tap me on the shoulder when I have them on.  I like to work a lot with headphones on, and these are now my go-to for that!CONSIf you have smaller ears, (like me) they fit exactly over my ears, so if you have a larger ear size, these might not work for you.  I wish the cord was a little longer too.  The cord measures 4 feet long, but feels a bit short for me.  I had to buy an extension for using them at my computer.PROSGreat sound.  Very comfortable.  Extremely NOISE canceling. I plug them into my IPhone and can use them to talk.  There is a microphone on the cord that you press to talk on. They come with a nice bag that you can carry them in.  The bag is a soft material that feels luxurious.Great Headphones, and for the price.......  Well, if you are looking for compact, these are great.  Bigger headphones may sound better, but then, how will you travel with them.  If you want compact, great sounding headphones you will get what you pay for.

First, this is a very high quality bike rack, and perfect for the wall of my man cave.  It's just to the right of my flat screen TV, so I can remotely turn the light on occasionally while watching a game with my friends, just to bust their chops.I have no real complaints about the rack itself, but have a couple recommendations:1. Drill a pilot hole for your screws, since I pretty much stripped them putting them into the stud without a pilot hole.2. Be careful putting the batteries into the light.  The instructions don't really tell you how to do it and I can see how someone might damage the light by thinking it's velcro'd on there.Basically, snap off the light from the plastic base.

0:24 Mins Holy Moly!  These are AWESOME!!!  I do a lot of gardening and have been looking for pruning shears that are really easy on my hands.  These pruning shears cut through some of the thickest branches in my garden!!!  I was like, "WHAT?"What is so darn awesome is that the main gear that operates the entire mechanism rotates out and has a cam mechanism unlike I have seen in any type of pruner I have ever used!  Being a girl, sometimes I wish I was a bit stronger to cut some of the bigger branches in my garden.But I tried these out, and I was like, "Whoa!!!"  What?  I didn't have to squeeze harder on the handle, they just cut!  The cam mechanism rotates on the left side of the sheers if you are cutting the branches with your right hand,  so I could see as one reviewer mentioned that if you are using your left hand to cut, the mechanism could actually get in your way.  Check this out on my video!  So these are for right handed folks... not left.The engineering design is so simple and so brilliant!!  Wow!  Wow!!

Simply the very best book out there on Codependency.  I refer this book to all of my clients and they always thank me.  So buy the book.  Run. Don't walk.  Even if you don't think you are co-dependent this book will help you and all of your loved ones.  It has a lot of heart and is brilliantly written.

A Good Memoir.  Not Great, but Good!  I didn't really "get into it" until about the middle of the book.  I kept waiting for it to get better.... it did toward the middle.What I liked about the book was that Jamie's voice is definitely his own.  He seems sweet, and innocent ... but having the type of mother that he had was hard. Which is most of what this book is about.  And also his alcoholism. Alcoholism is a tough road, and much of the book focuses on his addiction and the strong connection his addiction had to a lot of his choices, and also to his mother.  He is also gay, and that factors into the storytelling too. Some of the stories are interesting.... but at the end of the book I felt for Jamie.  Life is hard when you have the kind of mother she did.This is a good read, but I have to be honest that the praise on the cover made me anticipate more than what I got.  That is unfortunate because I did like the book. But I did not love it.  Sigh.  It wasn't the book that in the morning I run over to read every day.  In fact, I was wondering why I wasn't doing that... there was so much praise for this book on the cover.I have read a lot of books that make me jump up and want to read them...  And yes, I've read ALL of Augusten Burroughs books.... he's fantastic.  Brilliant actually. I would warn new Authors not to compare themselves to highly with really well known authors.  (on that note, maybe it was his publishers that pushed the comparison, not sure) In any case, it was a good read.I gave it four stars because I liked the Author.  He is lovable and has a good story.

This product is numbered from 1-8 on the bottom of the tabs.  The tabs are shiny and well made. They are a nice weight too... Not too heavy of paper, and not too light so you don't feel like you just bought paper.These dividers fit into a folder with  metal claps on both the right and left side of the folder.  NOTE::  The folder does NOT come with the product when you buy the dividers.  You have to buy Folders separately.Since I already use the folders with metal holders at the top in my client practice these are great.... I use this particular divider for the days of the week.  I put Mondays projects in 1, Tuesdays in 2, Wednesdays in 3 etc.  Number 8 I use for my "To Do" list.I am sure if you are into research these dividers would be fantastic.  The numbers are clear and easy to read.  But this is a very specific product.  You could put tabs on the bottom over the numbers and write on the tabs what you want...  that is probably what I will do.  Numbers are not really my way of organizing.  But this is a good quality product .... and for the price it ROCKS!!

Quite simply the best Jim Brickman book out there.  Easy to read. All of his wonderful songs.  I have a beginning piano student playing Angel Eyes!!  Its that easy.You also get the main chord written at the top of the bar, so if you are more of an advanced pianist, this book will work for you too!The price is more than reasonable.  There are 10 songs, the book is $10.Here are the songs:1) Angel Eyes2) Borders3) By Heart4) Heartland5) Hero's Dream6) If You Believe7) Picture This8) Rocket to the Moon9) Shaker Lakes10) Valentine

This is an office product that I wish I had a while ago.  I am a big "To Do" list person and I use the wire type folders for clients that these dividers work with.... so these dividers are great.  There are 8 tabs, and the fact that you can add MORE to each individual folder works really great for me!I did tried to write on the tabs with a pencil.  But I don't like how "light" the writing of the pencil is.  Then I tried to  "wipe it off" as they say it can do. It does wipe off really great.  If you are a person who needs to change the tabs all the time, these will work great for you!!!But, the pencil is not very "stand out" so I don't use a pencil on the Tabs now.  Then I tried to use a pen on the tabs  but it wipes off too easily ......  So now I use "Note Tabs" that I can pull off when I want to change the label. And the tabs are certainly big enough to put those on.I love the versatility of these dividers.  The price is a "little" steep for me but I do like the product.  The holes are copper reinforced and will last a long time.

This is the easiest way to take your Blood Pressure!  Wow!! Wow!! Wow!!This product comes wonderfully packaged and containing a beautiful unit that is 6 1/2 inches tall by 4 1/2 inches wide. It includes an arm cuff that you plug easily into the base and there are two settings on the base for two separate daily measurements. You can either use 4 AA batteries to run it (which are NOT included), or plug it directly into the wall.  It has a date setting too.It took me 5 minutes to figure out the product.  And that is truly because the instructions are amazing.  They are 4 steps you have to take and you are done!What I love is that you the can store two separate measurements in the device and have a daily reading and history of your readings.  There is also a heart rate indicator that tells you what your heart rate is.  That is pretty cool.The simplicity of this device is astounding to me.  I tried it on my husband, and he said the only issue he had was the "bossy" assistant who guided him through the process.  That would be me.  Its fun to know what your heart rate and blood pressure are.  The price is also reasonable given the ease and beauty of this well - thought out product!

A good memoir with lots of detail and depth.  And a story about the struggle to "fit in" as a young woman.  It is also a daddy and daughter story that details and documents that struggle and the desire for a young woman to want to please herself while being somewhat emotional dependent on a nonexistent relationship with her absent father.I did enjoy this book. But I don't think it is for everyone.  Many young woman will find its pages relevant to their own lives, but many may not deeply understand why Sarah shared her emotional story.For me,  it was like picking up Sarah's journal on her bedside table and reading the intimate pages beneath.  I like to read about other's lives and found this enjoyable and interesting.  For me it was is a ruggedly honest story which recounts a very unconventional upbringing and also the intense desire to have a father in her life.I felt for Sarah's loneliness and disappointing relationship with her father, but I think that relationship molds her into a strong woman with no need to have a father as part of her ultimate construct which makes her a very unique individual.

These Dubs ear plugs are very comfortable and do seem to create a nice balance between hearing nothing... and not hearingeverything.  They have a noise reduction rating of 12, which cuts the voice a bit.  It really does seem that they allow things (like voices) to be heard more clearly than the rest of the surrounding noises.I wear earplugs when I study, and these seem just about perfect for the job of not being distracted by outside sounds.I have not yet tried them at a concert or on an airplane yet. But I have used them in my office with noise going on outside and they really cut that outside sound pretty well.  If that is what you are getting them for - then this is a great price for that.They do not work as well as my $300 pair of noise canceling headphones, but they are hidden well in your ears without having a big headset on your head, and that I like!

This model of camera is my favorite budget friendly camera for point and click shooting and 1080p video recording, it has an amazingly powerful zoom lens for a camera this size, seriously incredible.  I like this model so much I bought 5 of them, and give them to all of my writing staff as their standard product imaging camera for doing video and written reviews.I had to buy every model, there is no disclosure or disclaimer for this product, Samsung doesn't ever send me these to review, I wish they did!

I liked the braided HDMI cable, was thick and the cable provided excellent video signal, but the thick cable is a little less flexible and if you use wall mount clips you need larger ones due to the thickness of the cable.  Overall a very decent cable and I use it for my PS4 to my Samsung TV.

The small size and flexible nature means you can keep this plugged into a laptop with a device right beside it and it can also be parallel to your charging device.  Gets the job done, neat little adapter.

We accidentally broke our old one that looked just like this bought at a local shop, this one saved the day for sure as it was a virtual exact replica.  The metal can be a little weak where it connects to the joint that you screw in so make sure nothing hangs or pulls too tightly on it.  Overall it is a classy antique looking bell and is great for gates where you want someone to ring but not step up on your property.

My 8 year year old loved assembling and painting the 3D Puzzle Shark.  It was very easy for him to put together and follow the instructions with nearly no assistance from a parent, the paints were easy to do as well with just a simple cup of water.  My son took it one step further when he got creative painting it so it didn't end up looking like the model painting :)

Each port can deliver up to 2.4A output which means you can charge 5 tablets at the same time (7 if you put 2 on the AC outlets).I have a window fan, Samsung Series 7 on the 2 AC ports, and on the USB ports I have a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, 2 Kindle Fire HDX 7 and an HTC One Remix and iPhone 5S charging ready to go.

Gloves are excellent for picking up pans, pots that are metal and get hot.  We have a gas stove, so our metal pans and pots would have burning hot handles to pick them up, this is useful for both inside the kitchen and out in the grill when basting meat or using short tongs where your hand would be over the open fire/heat.  Only wish they had other color options, like light pale blue, green, orange is a bit harsh of a color and matches no kitchen color scheme.

3:17 Mins Provides decent airflow, and is quiet.  Has a double sided USB plug that is pass through but USB 2 only so don't waste it in a USB 3 port.  It doesn't have adjustable angles or on/off switch, speed controls but works as your basic flat cooling pad. Bujian T102 11-15.6" Laptop Cooling Pad (Dual 6" Internal Copper-fans @1200rpm/each, Ultra Thin 1.5" Pad, Extra USB Port )-2fans is decent if you leave your laptop flat and don't need it at an angle.

I will be the first to admit that I am lazy when it comes to grilling, I grill then shut off grill and walk away to eat, the next time I clean my grill is often the next time I need to grill.  So this means whatever I was grilling usually ends up burnt and fused with the grill itself so I need some intense harsh metal cleaning brushes to scrape my grill clean.  This Anear Grill brush is very abrasive and has a very large surface, so it can scrub a grill well.  It works even better when the grill is on for a few min and hot, scraping old residue off with ease.  I like the long handle, my previous grill brush was too short and my hands almost burned a little while trying to clean the grill.The included basting brush is your average silcone basting brush, it is nice but I always found that thinner liquids don't adhere too well to silicone basting brushes, perfect for thicker sauces and spreading that last bit of marinade, but thinner sauces not as much.  Still when basting over a hot grill you can't afford to use a real brush or it may catch fire, so the basting brush is nice.  Now, I baste while it is on the grill, I wish the basting brush had a longer handle or extending handle so you can more easily baste the top parts of meat while they are grilling in back of grill, the brush handle is a little short but it works fine.Disclaimer:  Innoo did send me the Grill Brush and Basting Brush to do a thorough and accurate review, all opinions are 100% mine and mine alone.  If a product is crap, I call it like it is, and this product does the job well.

As LOTR fans they loved the spoofing and was good for their ages, my son at 11 still watches this show occasionally!

Live Saver fans in Southern CA during heat wave where we don't have A/C here near the coast and it got to 91 degrees, indoor temp reached 93 and these fans did a really good job of pulling in the cooler air outside.  I bought 3 of these total, for 2 rooms (have 2 in the same room working together).This helped us get through the summer with no AC for sure.These were designed for windows that open vertically so it lays Horizontal, but I used them in windows that slid open Horizontally and this fan actually stands vertical in the Window and still works fine, just make sure you are securely fastening it into the window.

One of the cartridges wouldn't be recognized by the printer and was useless, the others were recognized and worked though the ink was a tad more watery and tended to have very slight blurring/smear when printed on the same copy paper as original ink.  Overall you can tell the ink is slightly less quality than genuine, and the one cartridge not being recognized was a bummer but it does save a lot of money compared to name brand inks.

Really nice quality backpack and my 8 year old wanted a roller backpack as even at 8 they get a lot of books which makes carrying on shoulders a bit rough.  High quality, nice color and fits a ton of school supplies.

Bought this for my Mother in Law for her birthday and installed it, I really appreciate that they included plumbers tape with it.  The dual shower head is really nice, the big shower head has great flow and stream, the smaller one gives you the options.  Running both at the same time you get less water pressure, and unless you have enough water pressure you won't get enough flow out of both heads to use both at same time in some cases but this isn't a fault of the product.

I liked the movie, still like Kevin Costner in most of his later films and this one had a unique take and was different.  My wife and I enjoyed watching one night as a random movie pick and we weren't disappointed.

Portable, gets the job done, you can hold it under the hot water with ease to de-fog instantly, then shave, even hold in one hand while shaving with the other.  They say extra large but I actually wish it was even larger than it is though.

The funny thing is out of a half dozen laptop cooling pads, this one has the BEST stand portion (angles are great) the clamps hold the laptop well without sticking up too much and digging into wrists.  The single fan though large just doesn't seem to move a ton of airflow though, it is fair but I have had better airflow from triple and quadruple smaller fans vs the 1 larger fan.  It would have been nicer if they made an identical frame model with higher number of fans or faster speed for better airflow.I also wish the 4 USB ports were USB 3.0 and not USB 2.0, some devices won't work in the USB hub in the laptop cooling pad, mouse works fine, but my USB headset won't work from the Laptop cooling pad ports for example.

Honestly we are talking about being able to charge 6 tablets at the same time, I had 2 Kindle Fire hDX 7, 2 iPhone 5S, 1 Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and an ASUS T100-TA tablet all charging at the same time. Love the easy installation and that USB is the standard for installing the media now! Good value if you need a budget mouse/keyboard combo, the main con is the color is static with that rainbow spread, you can't change color patterns and you can't get a solid color, on or off only, no cycling, breathing...etc.  Still for a white keyboard/mouse that matches a white desk or PC case this product is very decent and won't disappoint if you are on a budget.

9:44 Mins In my video I show opening the case, and installing it on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" model, it installs in seconds, provides protection on all sides front and back, and the hard shell cover protects the screen when you put it in a bag and acts as a stand too. The protection is average, but it does have better and less slippery grip than other iPhone 6 Plus cases I have tested.  I still prefer the Defender series with full front and back cases and protection, but if you are just looking for a case with style and some protection the Symmetry will certainly do the job.

May have been nice in theory, but terrible in practice as suction cups don't hold onto plastic laptop bottoms, therefore it falls off and is completely nonfunctional. Yes, they are super bright and much brighter than you would think from LED, but the LED is little tiny bulbs on a flat board, it is direct mini beams of light right into your face, single direction.  It really could have used a little "hood" or mechanism to helps soften the direct light or make it a slightly wider area of projection.  My kids used this to record gaming videos at night where their faces were lit up, but the shorter arm length means you can't really optimize the light to be high above the laptop screen, and ends up being at eye level shining the light beam right in your eyes.  If you tilt to where the light is up or down, it brightens keys fine, but the light is very "single direction" specific so if you face it up or down, it won't brighten your face much.  It could have used a dome or globe to help distribute the light more evenly and avoid directly pointing it at your face, or perhaps longer cord and clip or something to help it go above your laptop lid.

I would give the Anear 60W 6 Port Desktop Charger 4.5 stars it is very nearly 5 stars, the only thing that causes me to not give the 5th star is the AC power cord is too short, it needed to be at least another foot and a half in length, it is short enough that when plugged in the charger can't reach and fit on top some shelves..  Also the plastic stand is a bit flimsy and could have used a stronger/sturdier stand with some anti-skid feet on it.Other than that though the product is fantastic, auto-senses and delivers the right charge for your mobile gadgets and being able to charge 6 devices, 3 tablets and 2 smartphones + a Bluetooth headset at the same time is just simply incredible and appreciated.

Also with it charging 4 devices 2 smartphones and 2 tablets for an hour on the road it did not get very hot, I have had some car chargers get very hot before.

4:15 Mins The Francois et Mimi is about the 5th Bluetooth earbuds I have used over the past year and these by far offer the loudest sound volume out of any previous ones I have reviewed, they do get a little distorted in low frequency range at max volume but it still sounds great. Keanu Reeves appears to get a character back that suits him most, far gone are the days of bill and ted he is a gritty guy, who soaks up all the underbelly or the dark and gritty side of our world only to come out on top with the only similar film cropping to mind being Constantine here: http://amzn.to/1SmGV3o which he also manages to pull of a similar role.

The most Authentic War film of our generation due to them actually using genuine Sherman, and Panzar tanks. All-in-all a good watch.

Really enjoyed it, and found it very much in the same vain as the Taken films with Liam Neeson.Good actors and those gritty feelings we all love that cinema can provide. This Kingston SSDNow V300 Series SV300S3D7 internal solid-state drive pushes well below the $1 per GB price point without compromising drive performance which you might have expected. While this panel does do games justice by going over to 4K and offering up some of the detail and definition they deserve it's still not perfect and you will want to compare it against something like this version here: http://amzn.to/1SmuPXU which is slightly cheaper, and offers up better vertical alignment solutions.Pros:+ Really nice HDTV-style chassis and bezel+ 40-inch 4K+ Cheaper than many 30-inch monitors.Cons:- Vertical Alignment issues- Stand not adjustable- Still quite expensive.

Recently purchased this due to my Cat's starting to malt in patches around my house and have to say this device does do what it set out too, It has a three stage cleaning that will pick up mostly everything you can find on your floor so its always worth just checking nothing valuable has been dropped somewhere before you let it loose. One feature that was handy for my hallway was the virtual wall as you can tell it not to go any further or see a boundary especially if its a surface that you know it will struggle to get to grips with. The only comparison that a family friend currently owns is this model here: http://amzn.to/1NmIzV4 which I'm told also does a pretty stellar job but with a bit more tweaking.

Great contrast and a market-busting price, along with a software update that largely fixes its video processing woes, help make the Vizio P series one of the best value 4K's available, but it's worth comparing to this model here: http://amzn.to/1REavT9 to ensure you are future proofing yourself once 4K content is rolled out across all mediums.THE GOOD:Vizio P series delivers 4K resolution for significantly less than other major brand TVs. Its picture quality, thanks to full-array local dimming, delivers deep black levels (aside from the 55-inch size) and excellent contrast for an LCD TV. Color accuracy and some aspects of video processing are solid, and input lag for gaming is among the lowest we've ever tested. The Vizio's feature set is well-chosen but not bloated, and it includes excellent connectivity with five 4K-compatible HDMI inputs.THE BAD:Overly aggressive video processing still appears with 4K sources unless you manually turn it off. Competing 4K TVs offer better color and a more natural image, especially prior to picture setting calibration.

This Sennheiser HD 558 out of the box is easily one of the best-sounding headphone pairs available in its under-$200 price range, but it isn't designed for easy use with mobile devices or computers which might be imprortant to most, so its worthing taking a look at some comparable items like this pair of Sennheiser here: http://amzn.to/1IYnrkS which currently have a reduced price point and offer richer sounding audio.PROS+ Superb audio performance with rich bass and excellent sense of space.+ Extremely comfortable.+ Strong value for price.CONSOpen design projects some sound outward; not ideal for recording studio or office use.Lacks 3.5mm headphone jack; not ideal for listening on mobile devices or computers.

My first impression when i heard the IE80's at its default setting was how clean the highs were in a way you can say that the highs are more refined now. Mids are as gorgeous as they have been in previous models. At the maximum level there is no sign of the infamous bass hump that some folks would look out for.
