And while Underwood begins to question the merits of his amoral belief system and what this means for completion of his assignment, Hawks has the perfect forum to air his views on metaphysical questions, the surveillance state in which the story is set, and what it really means to be human.If you are a fan of edgy and creative dystopian fiction, Spark is an intelligent thriller you won't want to miss.

This was my first Victor Carl novel, and I found it enjoyable as stand-alone read, though not as riveting as The Barkeep, another Lashner novel that I read recently.  What I like most about Bagmen is its irreverent protagonist, who offers a deliciously cynical perspective on politicians, lawyers, and the sordid ways in which they can intersect.  Enter the bagman, a shady figure who couriers illicit bribes from wealthy businessmen to politicians they want to influence, along with pay-offs by politicians to those they need to keep quiet.  When Victor joins their ranks and becomes a suspect in a murder investigation connected to a senator's pay-off of a blackmailer, Lashner dazzles the reader with a plot so twisted and full of corrupt players that it's impossible to tell whether anyone has pure intentions.What I don't like so much is the somewhat forced way in which Lashner tries to replicate the hard boiled writing style of noir fiction (over-the-top metaphors galore), and the increasing implausibility of the plot as it careens toward its bizarre climax with the Big Butter.Criticism aside, this was an entertaining read, and Lashner remains on my short list of briliiant authors in this genre.

This toothpaste has a subtle whitening effect, as advertised.  It also features a really intense minty flavor that makes your mouth feel incredibly clean.  This is a product I will likely buy as my regular toothpaste.

At only 207 pages, Dennis Lehane somehow manages to create a novel bursting with setting (the gritty side of Boston portrayed in Mystic River), populated by multi-dimensional characters, held together by a taut story line, featuring a touching man-woman-dog romantic subplot, and chalk full of meaningful themes.  This is truly a masterpiece, written without a single wasted word, and I can't wait to see the upcoming movie.The protagonist, Bob the bartender, first comes across as a well-meaning loner, who's failure to forge meaningful connections with anyone may be an indication of simple-minded purity.  But as Bob and cousin Marv, the former owner of a bar now controlled by Chechen mobsters, get caught up in events leading to a huge money-drop at the bar on Super Bowl Sunday, Bob gives up his life of reserved seclusion, gradually revealing a worldly, hard-nosed side that nobody sees coming.This book should be required reading for any aspiring novelist in the genre, as it offers a tutorial in how less is often more when it comes to compelling writing.  And for any reader who loves great crime fiction, this one is a must-read.

Once you get through the rather lengthy set-up steps for this filtered water bottle (which involve soaking the filter for an hour and running it under water for 3 minutes), this product is simple to fill from the tap and seems to work as advertised.  The water passing through the filter has a taste comparable to what you find in a bottled water, but at a greatly reduced cost and impact on the environment.  I like to keep a full bottle in my refrigerator, where I can grab it for rehydration after exercise or to accompany a meal.  One cautionary note is that water leaks out when you screw on the top if you fill it all the way.

The premise of Shaman Elizabeth Herrera's novel is a timely one, as evidence is mounting that our over-reliance on fossil fuels, deforestation, genetically-engineered crops and other economically-driven, but environmentally-irresponsible, practices is posing an existential threat to the planet earth. In Earth Sentinels, the indigenous people of the world revolt, led by shamans who are able to conjure totem animal companions and pass into the spiritual realm, where they learn from a mysterious figure named Bechard how to direct nature's powers against the leaders of governments and industries who are threatening the planet.  As the stakes mount and a violent showdown between the world's military powers and the Earth Sentinels looms, the story picks up its pace and becomes quite engaging.  It is in these creative action sequences that Herrera's writing is at its most assured, and there are some fine set pieces here.While an enjoyable read full of important messages, the choppy chapters (often only 1-2 pages) and numerous point-of-view characters make it hard to become attached to any of the protagonists and detract from the flow of the story.  Herrera also has a tendency to "tell" rather than "show" and write dialogue that is too on-the-nose.  As she develops more experience as a novelist, I have confidence that her craft will continue to improve.  And I look forward to what she has in store for us readers next.

Jennifer Murphy has written a clever murder mystery based on the premise that a sociopathic man, living compartmentalized lives with three wives, found murdered by wife number one at a beach house on the North Carolina shore, may or may not have been the victim of a conspiracy orchestrated by the three wives.  In addition to the clever three-wife premise, Jennifer Murphy uses multiple first-person points of view to tell the story in a non-chronological sequence.While deserving of 5 stars for its creativity, clean prose style and well-drawn characters, the way in which this mystery is told detracts somewhat from the suspense.  While it is hard to put my finger on the problem, I suspect it's that the classic mystery relies on a single narrator, limiting the reader's knowledge to the knowledge of the narrator.  Here, in order to withold the solution to the mystery, Murphy must limit what certain of the narrators share with the reader until the final pages, which comes across as unnatural and contrived. Also, as noted by other reviewers, some of the plot points strain credulity and seem out of character (most notably, the relationship between wife number one and the detective).These narrative issues aside, this novel held my attention and was an enjoyable read.  I especially appreciated the bond that developed between Picasso (the daughter of wife number one, and in many ways the most interesting character in the novel) and the detective.

When an opportunity presents itself to read and review a new novel by Alan Furst, I have always seized it, having become a fan of his authentic and sophisticated approach to espionage fiction set in the run-up to World War II.  Midnight in Europe fits comfortably into this established mold, but to a fault.Although Paris-based lawyer, Cristian Ferrar, is a complex and sympathetic protagonist whose good-natured womanizing provides a romantic thread that enhances the espionage elements associated with his support to the Spanish Republic's cause, Furst pays too little attention to developing a satisfying or complex plot.  It's as if Furst felt content simply to immerse the reader in the atmosphere of this period.  Perhaps Furst's point is that Ferrar's actions are inevitably inconsequential, yet heroic nonetheless, but I expect more from espionage fiction and from Furst in particular.So depite being well-written, sophisticated, and authentic feeling, I felt that Midnight in Europe's paint-by-numbers plot paled in comparison to Furst's other novels.

I don't have issues with my coccyx, thankfully, but I do have issues with my hips (bursitis), and my low back (arthritis in my lumbar vertebrae and sacrum). I have painful inflammation in my SI joint as well. So I HATE sitting down at my desk in my office. I cannot get comfortable and it is very annoying (not to mention painful). That is the purpose for wanting to try this out: to provide a more comfortable working environment for myself that is more ergonomically correct, plus doesn't cause pain. So far so good. It has been 3 days and I am able to sit for longer periods of time without pain.I received this in exchange for my honest review.

This is a decent inexpensive desk lamp with LED bulbs. I really didn't notice a difference in lights when changing selections. you won't want to look directly at this light (or any light for that matter) and the light arm is about a foot or so high... If you keep it on your desk you can plug it into your computer for a power source. Or, since it is a USB connection you can plug it into a USB adapter and into the wall. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

This is a heavy duty multi-tool. Reminds me of a mid-size leatherman tool that I had many years ago. It has some weight but isn't too heavy. The individual tools in it are a teeny bit hard to get out, but that is normal, as that is the way it was with my leatherman. There are a ton of screwdriver heads you can use. Including allen wrenches of various sizes.The pliers are nice ones with a firm grip. This is made of stainless steel and my guess that as a result, it won't rust. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

Forskolin is known to help with weight management, but also it is known to help regulate blood pressure. Most people do take it for weight loss and then see the results of lower blood pressure as an added bonus. You can take 1 capsule twice a day, before a meal. This bottle has 90 capsules in it, which ends up being a 45 day supply if you take twice a day. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

These are beautiful. They have flashing LEDs and come in multiple colors. They are really fun and we will be decorating with them. They have a USB cord so you can plug them into a usb port as well as a wall outlet. It makes it easier to use them in different places. I received these in exchange for my honest review.

This is the story of a young woman who wants to gain her independence and not be forced to marry a man her parents have chosen for her -- their best friends' son. The two knew each other as babies but when she was four, her parents moved clear across the country from Philadelphia to Denver. This story takes place maybe late 1800s or early 1900s.Unbeknownst to all involved, until the last minute, she realizes right when she elopes with another man, that in fact, this man is the same man her parents want her to marry.The twists and turns kept me flipping pages, and it is a heartwarming story of becoming an adult, living out your own life, gaining independence and respect, and leaving home, cutting the apron strings.It is a touchy feely good book -- no violence or tragic endings happening here.

This compost bin has a nice metal design, and you throw the food shavings (carrot peels, egg shells, etc) into the metal bucket and put the lid on. The lid has holes in it with what appears to be a carbon filter or charcoal filter. The holes are to let air in but the filter makes the smell stay put. It can get pretty rancid as the composting process starts.We are buying a house next week and will start to use it immediately. We plan on a large garden in the Spring and so we will be happy to have some nice compost to use for the garden. We received this in exchange for an honest review.

The size that I use most often is the smallest size, and I use that for my dog food can. The next size I use frequently is the largest one, on my bowls as I heat something up in the microwave. These are so flexible and can be used in the microwave, or frigerator. They are dishwasher safe and super easy to use! I received them in exchange for my honest review. And I definitely do recommend these!

This was an awesome, witty, fun loving book from Janet Evanovich. Although there is a teeny bit of violence (a drug raid across the street, broken leg, guns shooting, etc) it is definitely not a violent novel. The sex scenes are not too explicit and you just fall in love with the characters.I definitely can tell it was Evanovich's writing style, and the silly antics are there everywhere throughout the story. Laughing throughout, it was a fun read, one that I really needed!

Moringa is not a tasty plant at all. I have moringa powder and have to hide it in smoothies or juices to even be able to drink it. But this tea is tasty and so I like being able to have the benefit of moringa in a hot beverage, as I love sipping tea all day.

This will be helpful to put important papers or electronics in to prevent them from getting wet. You can use it while camping or boating, hiking (if it rains) or bring it to the beach or pool with you.

I really like these pens. I am getting addicted to the adult coloring books and prefer pens over pencils. The pencils I think "look" better, but hurt my hands as I have to put a ton of pressure, and the tip doesn't stay sharp, etc. So I like using colored pens mostly. With these, you get a couple neat things. They have a fine point tip, so coloring large areas is not going to be productive, but for the tiny spaces and coloring pages that have a ton of tiny areas, these are PERFECT. Also, they barely bleed. I still use a paper in between the coloring pages in my coloring books, but so far these have not bled onto that page yet.Why the 4 stars? I think they are a bit too expensive. A bit out of the price range for many people. Otherwise, these are the BEST markers ever. Maybe you just pay more for quality. If you do, then these are for you. You won't be disappointed. I did receive these in exchange for my honest review.

This is a nice, comfortable ring and it is very masculine. I like the Celtic pattern on it. The blue is hard to see, you have to look closely to see. It fits my husband (he is size 12 and that is what we got) and it easily slides on and off and doesn't hurt his knuckle when the band crosses over it. Unfortunately, my husband doesn't like to wear rings so he probably will only wear this on occasion. Not every day. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

I can charge everything I need to with this and it fits all the devices nicely. I was skeptical about large tablets and my phone since it has a very large case on it, but everything fits.The shorter charging cables pictured are not included, but there are small Velcro ties that help with the mess of the long cables. As you can see in my picture, it's definitely not as sleek looking as the picture. This is with the cables of only three devices. If you are looking to get the cables more organized, I would invest in some shorter ones.The turbo charge charged my phone in about three hours. It got a little warm charging many devices, but nothing to be concerned about. I would keep it in a well ventilated area rather than hidden away in a drawer.

I like it. It includes a great little stiff shell carrying case and the headset folds up fairly compact. The ear pieces fit snug over my ears (they don't sit on the ear) and the sound seems great. If I had to pick something to complain about, the only issue I had is that the cord is a bit short but not terrible (it is 4 ft long). It also feels very substantial and well made. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

This is high quality food grade silicone teething necklace. It can be used to have the baby play with and pinch while breastfeeding, as well. Sometimes babies grab hold of mama and squeeze and pinch and it is painful. You can let the baby play with these. They are safe. They are dishwasher safe, too, so you don't have to worry about sterilizing them. They come in a lot of colors and the design is pretty. I received these in exchange for my honest review

this garden hose nozzle has a total of 9 settings (and spray speeds). it is extremely easy to hold in your hand, it fits nicely (I have medium women sized hands). It is made of high quality soft touch plastic, and has a turn off valve in as an adapter. So far it hasn't leaked where you screw it on. That is my biggest pet peeve of hose nozzle ./ spray guns. I hate it when they leak!!  I received this in exchange for my honest review.

This teething necklace and bracelet set are great, especially for mama to wear as they look nice, but they are functional as well. Baby can chew on them (made of 100% food grade silicone, no BPA, PVC, etc) to help soothe them while they are teething. They are tasteless and odorless. They come in a lot of colors, and can be cleaned in the top rack of the dishwasher (yes, they are dishwasher safe!) you should boil them or wash them in the dishwasher before use. I received these in exchange for my honest review.

I am doing the iodine protocol that Dr. Brownstein recommends, however he doesn't recommend nascent iodine, which this is. I am seeing results with the protocol but I am doing both lugol's AND nascent. I think that might be why I am having good results. Iodine detoxes bromine especially. Bromine is a halide (halogen) and heavy metal that is in everything these days -- from new furniture and carpet (the anti-inflammable crap they spray on) to clothing, to any store bought bread, brominated flour, etc. It is a filler in many medications in high amounts. So, it can cause a lot of issues with our health, and that is one reason why high doses of iodine are important.When you take iodine, you should ALWAYS take selenium as well. They need each other. Otherwise you can cause a mineral imbalance and throw a lot of systems off. Especially if you have thyroid issues.Anyway, this stuff is easy to take. It is good to have on hand. And iodine is one of the most important minerals for us. It can prevent fibrocystic breast disease, and fibroids, and possibly help prevent breast cancer. Yes, you should take it every day! I received this in exchange for my honest review.

These swim goggles are larger than all the swimming goggles I have ever had (excluding my snorkeling goggles, they aren't that big). You can see well when you look down, and to the side in these.I did not wear them very long so I cannot say whether they quickly fogged up or not, but I didn't have any problems with them.They come in a hard plastic case that has a lid that pops off. It has tiny holes in the bottom to drain, and so that air can circulate (you don't want to have your goggles mold). The goggles are adjustable so you can have the perfect fit. I received these in exchange for my honest review.

These are hard core heavy duty kitchen serving and cooking utensils. They weight a lot. Are heavy in your hand, you know that with the weight these pieces are, they are not flimsy. They are good sized and have some good features. Not only are they made of stainless steel (so they won't rust), they are made of food grade professional silicone that is heat resistant. These won't melt like other cheap spatulas will!They also have a hole on the end in case you want to hang them up in your kitchen within easy reach.This would make a GREAT wedding gift, or a good housewarming gift for someone. It always feels better when you cook with high quality tools. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

The dogs are adorable, but I was hoping that it would be like the Amazing Birds coloring book by the same author. I have that one and it is fantastic. It tells a bit about each bird at the bottom. This one doesn't do that. I would have loved a description of each dog on the bottom of the page. It seems like it was abruptly cut off and made to be square instead of 8 1/2 x 11.I do look forward to spending time coloring these pages, and the artist has amazing technique. Very talented.I received this free in exchange for my honest review.

This set of grooming brush and pet clipper is great. The clipper is normal what you'd expect... high quality, durable, etc. with the features you are used to. But the brush! Oh my!! If dogs could purr, My dog would be purring. He was going crazy, nudging me not to stop "massaging" him with the brush. Tons of hair was removed -- he is a boxer, so they have short hair and very few grooming requirements. He looks fantastic! And I have a pile of his "dead hair" that probably has been needing to be removed and brushed for months. I am thrilled. I did receive this in exchange for my honest opinion and feedback, and all my words are based on my true experience.

This tool has quite a few features that it offers. It has a flashing red warning light, it also has an emergency flashlight, and a "knife" blade that can cut through seatbelts in an emergency if you ever get stuck (like you go into a river and are sinking and need to get out ASAP!). And it also has a ball peen hammer to cut through the glass in your vehicle so you can get out if you are trapped.It comes with a magnetic base so that if you are on the side of the road and need to use the light to look at your engine, it can hang from the hood. This is a good little tool to keep in your vehicle for sure. I received this in exchange for my honest review**It requires 2 AA batteries, not included**

This turkey baster is pretty neat. It is a regular baster, but instead of the plastic that my previous basters have been made out of, this is stainless steel. And, besides that, there is a little injection needle that you can use at the tip, so you can inject the flavor into your meats (or whatever you want to season from the inside). I make a butter / garlic sauce that I like to inject into my turkeys when I roast them for Thanksgiving. This will make it MUCH easier!And to add to it? A brush to clean the inside out. Awesome. I really like this turkey baster and recommend it. I received it in exchange for my honest review but think this will be a good seller.

This is a thick, solid bamboo cutting board. It is more hygienic than other woods, even hard wood like maple. They will most always eventually leave scars from the knife, which will result in moisture pockets, food particles and bacteria to accumulate. Bamboo is great because it is dense enough to resist knife scarring and also naturally resists water penetration, so no bacteria forms. Of course you have to clean it and sanitize it like normal, but it is good to know you have more going for you to keep your family healthy with no food poisoning!This cutting board has legs on one side so it is easier to grasp or pick up, and it just looks nice. I really like it. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

I am in love! Ok, this is awesome. I probably won't be using the scissors much in this kit, but I ALWAYS need tweezers. This grooming set has THREE different pairs of tweezers. Seriously. A set for taking out my husband's splinters (he does woodworking for a hobby), a set for tweezing my eye brows and a set for whatever else I need! Mostly I use them for splinters and to pluck. But all the cheap pairs I have had in the past do not work well at all for splinters. I like the sharp ones where I can dig into the splinter and then get a hold of it.This it is small, it comes in a black carrying case that is easy to store or easy to fit in a purse or briefcase. You may as well buy two kits, and keep one at work with you! I received this in exchange for my honest review.

This is a 15 day supply of Forskolin, it contains 60 capsules and each serving is 2 capsules. You take 2 servings per day 20-30 minutes before meals. It is a well known weight loss supplement and has other uses as well, I think it can help regulate blood sugar (please check with your doctor if you have any questions or issues with blood sugar, I just remember my doctor telling me that and some research I did before I started taking Forskolin.)This is pure forskolin, no additives, and it is in gelcaps. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

These are lightweight, stainless steel tongs with a nylon end to them and easy to grasp. There are a set of two tongs included. They are about 12" long and have a hook ring on the end so you can hang them if you want. They will work for barbecuing, for grilling meats in the kitchen, or whatever you may need them for. The value is there. I received these in exchange for my honest review.

I have a hearing loss and wear hearing aids sometimes. Most of the time, since I work from home, I don't wear them. But when I go out and am going to be in meetings or in public, then I like to be able to hear better. When I have to get up at an early time -- so I have to set my alarm, my husband has to wake me up because I cannot hear it. This will help with that. i tested it out and the vibration would totally wake me.The one thing I have concerns about is the bluetooth wireless. I am sensitive to EMFs and don't sleep with my cell phone under my pillow or near my head. I don't use bluetooth regularly, so this will be used only when I need to wake up for sure, and not oversleep my alarm. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

This is a nice, 6+ feet charging cable for your iPhone. It has a braided blue and black cord that seems pretty heavy duty. It works well and I have no complaints. I received this in exchange for my honest review.
I just found A.R. Winters as an author with her Tiffany Black series in Las Vegas. And I read all those and then couldn't get enough so I read the Valerie mysteries. I really like them!! Thank you!!

I got these with the intention of giving them to my two little nieces. 2 years old and 4 years old. They think they are pretty cool but are too young to even know how to play card games beyond the "old maid" and "memory matching" games. So, while these cards are totally awesome to them (they hit the jackpot and carry them around with them now) they are not using them to play the game with. They came with no instructions, and they were just wrapped, not a big deal at all, because for the purpose that we are using them for, it will suit just fine. But if you want to play the game, you have to get a starter deck. As of now, I am still "favorite aunt" and that is all that matters!! :)  I did receive these as a sample in exchange for my review.

This item comes with 5 interchange able lenses, a carrying case, and a sock. Only one of the lenses has UV protection and it's the black lens.These have worked well thus far. The fit is a little tight on the sides of my head and I usually wear a size M/L hat or helmet. These seem OK so far. But just OK. The frame has a lot of flex so when I'm putting these on, it causes the side of the lens to pop out of the frame, and needs to be snapped back into place. These are only held in place in the middle of the frame above the bridge. Swapping lenses was quick and easy enough. though if you have a high nose bridge, These glasses will sit a little bit higher on your face. Overall I'm happy with these for the cost. Though I'm not ready to retire my other ones just yet. These were given to me as a sample in exchange for a review.

I would give these a 3 star rating. Mainly because of the awesome travel case. This set came with the goggle, a stiff carry case, and a bag. These goggles look nice and are comfortable to wear. There are rubber strips on the inside of the goggle straps that help hold this nicely to a helmet that doesn't let the strap slip around.My main issue with these (and hence the 3-star review) is that the ventilation on the google is rather poor. The lens has no vents, and vents around the frame are not enough. The little cut-outs on the front of the frame, are just cosmetic. If you fog up the lenses on these goggles you are going to have a hard time getting them to clear up. It's just the nature of the design. I had to remove the lens to take off the scratch protective film that's on the inside of the lens, and getting the lens back into place was a bit tricky, but doable. overall I'm not disappointed with these goggles due to the price point, but I'm not overly impressed by its function to mitigate a fogged lens. I would save these for warm days, as if you ride during a snow storm the top vents will get blocked and not breathe.These were given to me as a sample to review.

This solar charging LED camping lantern has it all. It is small and compact, so it doesn't take a lot of storage space. It has 6 bright LEDs that really show a lot of light into the area you are in. You can use it with batteries, or charge it up via a charging cord (outlet), or use the solar panel to charge it via our lovely sun!It also has a USB output so you can charge your mobile devices, which I think is pretty cool.So overall, this lantern worked nicely. As expected, and although I haven't tried charging my phone completely from it, I did plug it in and saw that it was charging. I don't know how long it takes or how much charge it will give it. I did receive this in exchange for my honest review.

This came at a perfect time -- right before I will need it for Thanksgiving! It has a long, sturdy handle so you won't worry about burning yourself. It has a clip so you can clip it to the side of a pot or elsewhere. This will be quite effective for making yogurt. I make it in a pot and keep it in the oven and put it on warm, and then turn it off and keep the oven light on, over and over, to keep it at the right temperature. To have this able to clip on to the side makes it so much easier.It has a sheath to protect it, as it has a sharp point at the end. This is nice, it is digital and has easy to press buttons and an easy to read display. I received this in exchange for my honest review.

The allreli HDMI switch is about what you think it would be.  Just like the photo, it has one output and three inputs; a manual switch on the unit itself; and an IR remote with a sensor you can plug in.  The remote comes with batteries also.The switch says it can support 4K, but it also only supports HDMI 1.4.  2.0 is required for most devices to function properly.  My tablet would not output to 4K through the switch, and neither would my Roku 4.  Changing the resolution to 1080p made it pass through appropriately.  In all fairness, I do not own a 4K television, but when I set devices to output in 4K, the TV downsamples it.  It didn't happen at all with the switch and I'm not sure if that's the fault of the switch or my television, but I suspect the former.I did not note any ghosting, which I had seen on other switches.  That means this unit has sufficient electrical insulation within to prevent the signal from "bleeding".  In short, it's a high quality unit.The bottom line: if you're getting this for 1080p devices or lower, it works really well.  I would exercise caution if I wanted to use it with devices that output 4K - especially since they require HDMI 2.0 to operate properly.The 4K support thing on the box is a bit misleading. It will output 4K video signals, but not at refresh rates anything but computers will output.I received this product in exchange for my honest review

Both my husband and I tried these on and they fit comfortably for both of us. We have grossly different sized heads!It comes in a nice plastic case to protect it, and store it. And it has anti-fogging capabilities and UV protection. We received this in exchange for our honest review. We haven't tried them out yet since it is November and we haven't been swimming for a couple weeks. But we will try them out soon, next time we head out of town.

I have been taking Forskolin for a few years now for health reasons and I like this brand because it only has Forskolin in it, and no other ingredients except cellulose and rice flour (for the capsule). It is standardized 20% so each serving has a total of 50mg of standardized forskolin. It says 500mg on it and I am not positive how it goes from 500mg as the serving size, to 50mg but there is an explanation.You take 2 per serving, twice a day. This is enough for 15 days worth if you do take 4 per day (60 total capsules). Many people use Forskolin for weight loss but I use it for my adrenals as it was recommended from my doctor.I received this in exchange for my honest review

If you read my review of MMS CardShark Ortiz- #2 the same applies to this DVD. I got these DVDs because I read great reviews in magic forums and because the price was low. However, once again these great tricks are mainly for pros. I can not see myself (or any amateur) learning or performing such advanced tricks without months of practice. Again I recommend Aldo Colombini DVDs which are suitable for all except perhaps top professional  magicians.

The magic is awesome to watch. However, for the average amateur it's too difficult. The tricks, although amazing, require too many steps to learn. For professionals, however, this may be just right for you. I prefer and recommend DVDs by the late Aldo Colombini which are fantastic. There are many of them (just search Amazon). Each usally has 10 tricks whch range from very easy to advanced. Although I enjoyed watching and learning from the Cardshark DVD the tricks just weren't practical.

This is a great supplement to lower blood pressure. For the last few months I've taken less medication than before (from 5 mg amlodipine down to 2.5 mg). I take the low dose prescription about 8 PM and then I take half a capsule of Arjuna about 10:30 PM. By 11 PM I'm very sleepy and get about 2 hours more sleep each night. Most importantly my average blood pressure reading is around 118/72 rather than 130/85 before taking Arjuna.Why only 4 stars? It's because the cap was loose when I received it and would not screw tightly. The company needs to stop using a cheap bottle cap which will not close. I solved the problem by using an empty jar (with a tight lid) to store the capsules. The expiration date was January 2017 and I received it in July 2015. That's good because this will last for months. It works so well to lower blood pressure that I will definitely order this again.One word of caution. Since everyone is different start with a small dose of about half a capsule. If you take too much it will lower your blood pressure too much which can cause headaches and  make you extremely tired. If you take your blood pressure before using Arjuna and then 45 minutes later, you will know if it's working. This is the very best supplement (and I've tried many) to lower blood pressure that actually works!

This may be the best over-the-counter pain relief you can get without a prescription. Within a minute after spraying Cryoderm created a very warm heat on the applied area. I used it for neck pain and at first it burned because I used 2 sprays. I didn't realize it was so strong. After about 15 minutes the burning calmed down and it felt great. Most of my pain was gone and I was able to sit at my computer without feeling neck pain. This is a lot safer than swallowing harmful drugs which can take an hour or longer to start working.This works fast but I found that just 1 spray is enough. I would definitely order this again.

This is an excellent easy to read book. It teaches the basics of card magic as well as some advanced tricks. For less than $5 this is a super great deal. Each trick and technique is fully described along with appropriate photos which make it easier to learn. Although geared towards beginners it has some great card tricks that even more advanced magicians will use. There are about 50 tricks plus tips and techniques needed for some of the tricks. Highly recommended to all who want to learn card tricks.

This is useless because there was no explanation of how to do the so-called trick. All you receive is 10 regular playing cards and 6 gaff cards. Although the effect is described on Amazon the method of performing is missing. In other words the necessary secret to do the trick (if it exists) is missing. This is like buying a book with blank pages. Don't waste your time and money.

This is a very good magic trick DVD perfect for amateurs like me. As with most Colombini DVDs you get a variety of 10 tricks ranging from amazing to mediocre. My only complaint is that, although mostly easy,  too many tricks require buying or making other props to perform. I would have preferred most tricks to be impromptu using just an ordinary deck of cards. Nevertheless I found 4 great tricks that make this DVD well worth the price. The 4 best tricks I'll briefly describe below:1.) Wild Card Cash - You show 2 jokers (front and back) which appear normal. When you rub the jokers a $20 bill apears between them. Very easy to learn but you'll need about 15 minutes to create the gimmick. This will get great reactions.2.) Countdown - This is a mind blowing prediction trick involving colored numbers and 12 special cards. Great trick but requires props which you must buy.3.) Divin-Ace-Tion - A very nice mostly self working way to produce 4 aces from a regular deck.4.) Ken's Clock - My favorite trick which will shock spectators. It's a very clever variation of the famous clock trick where you know what hour and card will be chosen on a clock. The surprise at the end will be totally unexpected if you've never seen this. Although you'll need to make a simple prop this can be done without any props other than a deck of cards.Overall a worthy addition to any magic collection. I highly recommend this to all amateur magicians who perform for family and friends.

It does give you an energy boost which lasts for a few hours. However if you have high blood pressure do not use this. The next few days you can get a upward spike in blood pressure which makes these unsafe. I showed these to my doctor who told me not to use them. It's not worth the health risk.

This is the perfect amount of light for my basement. I was using a 100 watt bulb but it only lit up part of my basement. With this light I can clearly see throughout the basement which is about the size of a fairly large living room. I checked in various stores but none had a light over 100 watts. Thanks to Amazon I can now see the electronic display of my new elliptical which is positioned about 6 feet away from the light! The price was inexpensive and for the last 2 months or so it has worked as expected.

This is fantastic for doing floor exercises such as pushups, crunches, situps, leg raises and almost any other floor exercise. I went to several local stores and saw mats that were more expensive and very thin (0.5 inch thick or less). This mat is much thicker, softer & pliable. It does a great job of supporting my knees when kneeling. It's very soft and cushions your whole body. The dimensions 24 inches wide, 72 inches long & 5 inches thick are just perfect. A great buy and highly recommended if you value your body.

This took nearly 4 weeks to arrive after ordering. By the time it arrived my rib injury was about 75% better. When you spray this on it does a decent job of freezing and numbing the pain for a few hours. However this is highly overpriced for a tiny little so-called 3.3 ounce can (it looks more like 2 ounces). Furthermore, ICY HOT roll on works just as well and lasts longer. Also 4 ICY HOTS cost less than 1 Ethyl Chloride can. Because of the outrageous price I will never buy this again. My suggestion is to try Icy Hot first. Get the one with a no mess roll on applicator so you don't have to touch it.

This book has about 20 simple number tricks. It's definitely not for serious magicians. In fact it should be called "amateur number tricks for elementary school kids". I did find one good trick that I liked. However the rest of the number tricks were very basic and would not fool anyone except perhaps 6th graders or below. It may be good to get kids interested in mathematics. The price was good but I do not recommend this if you are looking for good number tricks that would be suitable for adults.

This works perfectly on my Acer A500 tablet. After 4 years of constant use my old charger stopped charging. This replacement charger is an excellent replacement and is much less expensive than the rip off price from Acer. I don't know if it works on other tablets but if you have an A500 it defintely works. Be prepared to wait because it ships from China. It took about 3 weeks to arrive but now I'm very happy to use my tablet again.

This is extremely thin tape which is not suitable for athletics. The protection is minimal at best. I used it the other day on my knees while exercising. Unfortunately it did not protect my knees as well as KT tape and other athletic tapes do. I am now once again recovering from very sore painful knees due to old injuries. With good tape this has not happened in over a year. I honestly don't know where all the good reviews are coming from because this is definitely NOT the proper tape to use. It's about as thin as masking tape which costs much less than this tape. Perhaps some people don't realize how dangerous this is until they feel pain from past injuries. I recommend spending more money to get REAL sports tape. I truly hope others will learn from my unfortunate experience. I do recommend KT tape or Kinesiology Tape which I have used successfully for over a year.

I used to belong to a chess club. These pieces are excellent tournament size pieces just like in the chess club. The quality, look and feel are just perfect. If you are a chess lover these chess pieces are just the right size. The price was also good because I've seen these in stores selling for as much as $39. You don't get the chess board but I have a large board which I'm now using with these pieces. Anyway this is a great deal for all serious chess players.

I bought this from Bayou Fitness back in October 2014 and recently sold it for about half of what I paid for it. There's a reason this is not sold locally in stores. It looks great on video but when you try it in person it's not that great at all. Most people will not be comfortable with this but a small percentage will like it. That's where the good reviews are coming from. I will elaborate below.PROS1. Very sturdy well built machine2. Lots of nice extra parts (some are actually useful)3. Good email support and online chat help from the company4. A few of the exercises are actually pretty good5. Much less expensive than the Total Gym which is very similarCONS1. Some of the exercises are not ergonomically correct. You have to awkwardly reposition your body in unnatural ways to perform many of the exercises. Because of this I pinched a muscle in my neck. Fortunately I have a good doctor who asked the right questions and figured out what was wrong. It took me nearly 2 months to recover.2. The so-called instructions are a complete mess. You get too many papers, tons of forms and 2 videos. Unfortunately nothing except trial and error helps to use this machine. It took several workouts just to become familiar with the proper use. I emailed the company several times and they admitted that their instructions need to be redone.3. It is awkward at best to fold it up and unfold. Definitely not at all easy like they want you to believe.4. Many of the levels feel the same. For some exercises you have to raise it 2 or 3 levels to notice a difference. Also even the lowest levels will be hard for most women mainly because it's very awkward.5. Each exercise moves your body rather than you moving yourself. This can cause vertigo or dizziness in some people.6. The amount of exertion is not actually known. It's more of a guess. The percentage of body weight used is not accurate. It feels way different than the weight you're supposed to be using.7. When I first got it the chords were way too long. I'm 5'8" and the chords were designed for someone much taller. However, the company did explain how to cut or shorten the chords which was very annoying.In summary I was very disappointed with this machine. I really tried and wanted to like it but it just wasn't for me. My suggestion is to always try an exercise machine in person before buying it. If this unit were sold in stores I truly believe that 95% would walk away right after trying it. It is not a completely natural form of exercise. For less money I recommend a stationary pulley machine from Gold's gym or Weider. You will have better control and know exactly how much weight you're using. Also you will be less likely to get injured due to poor ergonomics. I found out the hard way that simple exercises are the best. No more gimmicks for me.

I got 2 of these for my 7 and 12 year old granddaughters. They both love the dresses (they are Barbie addicts). You get 4 dresses of different colors that fit most Barbie dolls about 12" tall. This is a good deal because local stores sell 1 dress for more than all 4 dresses sold here. Highly recommended for anyone who collects Barbie dolls.

This comes with a regular ESP deck of 25 cards and a booklet which explains more than a dozen simple tricks. The cards contain 5 symbols repeated 5 times. Although there were some good ideas the magic tricks were not what I expected. The cards are supposed to be marked but even with a magnifying glass I could see no differences. This eliminates many of the described magic tricks because you would need x-ray vision to do them. Out of the 18 described tricks I found 1 or 2 ideas that I would actually use with some changes. Also there were no self working mathematical tricks which is very often used with these type of cards. The tricks are too simplistic and geared towards a beginner trying to fool children. A much better choice for learning ESP magic is ESP Card Magic (Nick Trost Routines) Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 by Aldo Colombini. These DVDs are both sold on Amazon. They are cheaper and much much better because they provide great visual learning. I have both of these DVDs. Each one has several very strong but easy to learn professional magic tricks. Unfortunately, even for beginners, I do not recommend Entertaining ESP.

I've used at least 4 different brands of tape for my knees. This tape has a bit more stickiness and seems to hold a bit better than the others. It's very supportive and can definitely help prevent further injury to weak or injured body parts. Before ordering I always check the price. This one was a bit cheaper than most of the others. For reasons I mentioned I would definitely consider ordering again since it's very good tape and a good deal.They offer you an ebook with your order which, in my opinion, is almost useless. It's merely a short pamphlet which you download. It does have some simple common sense tips to prevent injury which most people already know. A better bonus would be something people can really use such as an extra foot of tape. Then I would probably place TWO orders. Nevertheless this is a very good tape and I do recommend it.

I've had this a few days now and for my purpose it's perfect. It is very much like a smart TV but much less expensive. I always felt too smart to get a smart TV because it's a rip off. I got this to get more viewing choices for my upstairs bedroom HDTV without paying extra to cable. With an antenna we only got 3-4 channels. Now we get you tube, 100s of free movies, OVGuide and many many other free choices. Everything plays in high quality HD. Once I figured out how to search on youtube it gave us countless more choices because you can find virtually anything including tons of free movies and TV shows at no extra cost. The best part is that I don't have to pay monthly fees to watch TV in my bedroom. In addition I'm getting even more choices than with cable. Now I'm able to watch what I want when I want at no extra charge. In the past I've tried converter boxes, USB devices and antennas but could never get more than a few limited channels. Now at last my search is over. I absolutely love this device. The more I use it the more I'm learning about my choices. I'd gladly give up cable (downstairs) in a second for this. However other members of my family are addicted to various shows which this device can not easily get. I've been watching this for a few hours a day for the last 3 days and I'm loving it!

YS Eco Bee Farms raw honey was the best honey deal I found on Amazon. Locally I can get honey for about the same price ($7 per pound). However, this honey is creamier, tastier and thicker which is just the way I like it. This has many benefits too numerous to list here. I use it in tea whenever I get cold or flu symptoms. If you drink tea with honey and lemon 2-3 times a day it will usually resolve your cold symptoms within a day or two. You can also use this to prevent constipation. Just use a tablespoon in a small glass of warm water. I do this almost every morning before breakfast. When I forget a get a little constipated. As long as the price stays fair I will definitely buy this honey again. I highly recommend it for the taste and health benefits.

This review is based on my personal experience. It doesn't necessarily mean this will not work for you. However be aware that if your door is less than 30 inches wide this will not work well at all. I tried to use this on my basement door which is 26" wide and about 6 feet high. Here are the problems I encountered:1.) It was about 4 inches too loose. When I tried making it tighter it would not stay in place. As soon as you try to exercise it will immediately become loose. It may only be suitable on doors that are 30" or more in width. On the other hand it may not work well at all. This is a product that you have to try in person before buying.2.) This device is merely a bunch of belts, straps and buckles similar to car seat belts. I believe this is just not designed well enough to stay in place on any door. I really wish this weren't true but it definitely was when I attempted to use it. Perhaps if it had some material attached to the door it could provide a more secure attachment. As it is it doesn't work well at all.3,) The straps were cramped and didn't have enough room to comfortably fit (top to bottom of the door). If it were 3 straps it would have just made it. Also 4 straps is overkill. All most people need is a high, middle and low pulley for 95% of all exercises. Unless you have a very tall door, well over 6 feet, 4 straps will not have enough room. They will be cramped making this unusable.4.) The time it takes to constantly adjust the belts, buckles and straps is a waste. You'll need to adjust and tighten constantly. It's much faster and easier to simply secure it lower or higher using the bodylastics equipment you probably already have.In summary this is definitely an item that should be tried in person. If your door is not the right size it simply won't work. I find it deceptive that the company would lie by claiming that it works on doors 26" (or more). It definitely does not work on 26" wide doors. The concept is great but the execution simply does not work on all doors. The good thing is that I was able to return this to Amazon and get a full refund. The Bodylastics band system is excellent but the Ultranchor is unnecessary and does not work as expected. I think the company should try again because with improvements made this could be beneficial to all. As it is now it definitely won't work with the wrong size door!

I've been taking this every night before bedtime for more than a week . Within 30-45 minutes it kicks in and makes you calm, relaxed and able to sleep. I awake feeling refreshed with no side effects whatsoever. This is a safe natural way to help you sleep. After 3 days of daily use I noticed my blood pressure decrease by 5-10 points on average. Another plus here is that magnesium helps relax your muscles and is useful to recover from exercise.I have 2 reasons for giving it 4 stars instead of 5. First problem is that I received a poorly packed item. The zip lock top was partially open and some of the powder had spilled out. I also don't like receiving a pack that's only about 1/3 full. For that they should use a smaller packet and fill it up. Better yet they should use a small plastic container with a lid so it won't spill. Another drawback is that you don't really know precisely how much you're taking when it's in powder form because you're estimating. A better choice, to me at least, is capsule or pill form. That's exactly what I will order when my present supply runs out.Overall I do recommend this type of magnesium which is fast absorbing, has multiple health benefits and is easy to take. However, I think capsule or pill form can serve the same purpose and may be less expensive as well.

This stevia is very sweet which means only 1/4 of a teaspoon or less will taste like a teaspoon of sugar and be enough for most people. It's 3.53 ounces of pure powder which is a lot and should last for months. I've been using it in coffee and a very small amount gives me just the right sweetness. Those who like a sweeter taste can add a bit more.Unfortunately the packet I received clearly says 90% stevia which to me is not 100% pure. My batch contains something called rebaudiosides and steviol glycosides which, according to foodnavigator-USA website, is not all that natural.Although this tastes good, with no bitter aftertaste, I will not use this one again. I prefer 100% stevia with nothing else added. Next time I will buy locally at Trader Joe where they have 3.5 ounces of really pure stevia 100 packets for about one third the price sold here. Note that with packets you can always use half if it's too sweet and save the rest.

This gives you general information about vertigo (dizziness) along with some simple home remedies. After I ordered this I found out that my blood pressure medication was causing the vertigo. Instead of taking it right before bed I now take it (5 milligrams amlodipine) about 3 hours before bedtime. It has alleviated my vertigo by about 80-90% which is great. This will not help because it doesn't contain enough information. It only has 38 pages which makes it a pamphlet rather than a book. Also most of the information can easily be found all over the internet. To me this is just an over priced pamphlet that is minimally helpful at best. The back of the booklet has a link to a website. However, the website was flagged as being dangerous and untrustworthy by my browser. My opinion here is don't waste your time or money. See your doctor instead.

These are very realistic as shown in the picture. They are about 2 inches in length which is big enough to frighten anyone. I always fool guests in my house by putting a bunch on the sofa. To make them realistic  I add some vaseline. This makes them shiny and more scary looking. Also I place some right side up and some upside down. The bottom of these is also very realistic. When people go to sit down I just love to watch their screams and scared reactions. I also tried scotch taping them on my wall but some noticed the tape right away. You can have a lot of fun with these. To me this was worth every penny.

These do work in my Canon iP2702. The prints, both photos and text, look just as good as with the more expensive cartridges. You may have to reset your printer by holding the top and bottom buttons and waiting about 2-3 minutes.I plan to order again and to fill the empty cartridges with a refill kit I bought. After 2 refills you need to buy more cartridges because you run the risk of leaking ink and ruining the printer.A negative to these cartridges is that they have a little less ink than the more expensive so-called genuine cartridges. I would estimate about 15-20% less ink. Nevertheless, these are still cheaper than the outrageous over priced rip offs from the printer manufacturers who try to force their brand of ink on consumers. There should be a law that forbids this because it's like car companies trying to force you to use only their brand of gasoline. Also, if you do the math, ink sells for about 100 times more than the same quantity of gasoline!

This is a tiny 1 inch trinket that looks like it came from a cheap discount store. Don't be fooled by the blown up photo that sells this item. It's much much smaller than the photo would have you believe. I bought this because my granddaughter loves Littlest Pet Shop. To me this is an over priced rip off. Also prices here were raised on so-called cyber Monday which I think is disgraceful. Next time I'll buy toys in person where I can actually see and touch the item.

This is a fairly thin playing card made with some metal to attract magnets. It's fairly thin and can easily be placed in a deck of cards with little chance of anyone noticing that it's a gimmick card. The only problem is that there are no instructions whatsoever. Unless you're an advanced or very knowledgeable magician this will be useless. They should have included instructions for at least a few magic tricks. Also they should have  included a small magnet. Without these instructions and a small magnet, you will not be able to use this card.

This may be the best card magic DVD ever. It's got 10 great tricks performed and explained by 2 great magicians (Aldo Colombini and Cameron Francis). This is way better than their other DVD called Small Wonders because the tricks are amazing, fairly simple and mind blowing. Unlike Small Wonders, some tricks are pretty easy to learn and some are practically self working. One of the best tricks, which is worth the price of the DVD alone, is Cameron Francis' Improbable VS Impossible. I saw this performed on another site and just had to learn it. It has a double surprise and the end will shock and amaze anyone. Another great trick on the DVD is called Three Impossible Things. It's a great mind reading effect where the magician predicts or reads your mind 3 different ways in the same trick. Fantastic effect and almost self working. Those who enjoy learning card magic tricks will absolutely love this DVD. There are at least 5 tricks (maybe more) that are each individually worth the price of this DVD. I highly recommend this to all regardless of your skill level.

For the price (less than $5) this is a great deal. Although about 75 of the 101 tricks are simplistic there are a few good classics. There are also numerous math tricks which are basically self working. Some tricks use easy to get objects such as a deck of cards. The book is well written, in large type, and contains numerous drawings and diagrams. If you are a beginner you will love this book. It will teach you lots of good magic tricks that will amaze and entertain. If you are an experienced amateur like me you will still find several classic tricks to add to your repertoire. All in all a good book for children or adults who want to learn magic tricks.

This is actually a good book on street magic. It has at least 10 or more very good tricks that will amaze anyone who's not familiar with the secrets. However, the type is so tiny that it's almost impossible to see. To read it I use reading glasses and a magnifying glass. Even then it's annoyingly hard to see. This is an oversight by the publisher. It would have been at least a 4 star if the print was more readable. There's no excuse for such inconsiderate publishing. For this reason I do not recommend this book unless you want to strain your eyes. There are numerous other magic books that you can actually see. One good one is Scarne On Card Tricks. It has normal size print and many excellent classic card tricks.

I've been performing amateur card magic for friends and family for many years. I wanted to learn some new tricks and this DVD more than met my expectations. Simon Lovell does a great job demonstrating and explaining some very clever and ingenious card magic.The tricks range from very easy for beginners to very advanced for pros. So far I've learned and found secrets to more than 20 great magic tricks. This DVD has so much great material that you will probably be learning new tricks for many months. A few tricks (not many) are too difficult for me because they require too many sleights. However, of the 30-40 tricks shown, at least half are easy enough for beginners to learn.Another company called Big Blind Media also sells good magic DVDs with great tricks. However, they charge $35-$40 for most of their DVDs. Furthermore, you would have to buy at least 3 of their DVDs to get as many tricks as you get with Super Suble Card Miracles. For all card magic fans out there, I highly recommend this DVD even though the price just went up. It's still a great deal!

Over the years my knee problems have improved to the point where I don't need the most deluxe or advanced support. With that in mind I ordered this one. I used it yesterday to play 2 games of doubles handball. This morning I was somewhat sore in most areas of my body except my knees. This means that this support offered good protection and did the job.My only minor complaint is that it's very thin. For that reason I don't recommend this if you have very serious knee problems like I once did. For the more serious knee problems I recommend the Shock Doctor Ultra which is also sold on Amazon.The Captain knee brace has adjustable straps and is helpful for mild to moderate sprains or strains in your knee area. I ordered large, by the way, and it fits perfectly. The circumference around the middle of my knee measures close to 16". If you're bigger or smaller you might want to consider a different size. Overall I would definitely recommend this for most knee problems. Because it's thin it's also good to use when playing sports such as tennis, handball and raquetball. More physical sports such as basketball or wrestling might require a more deluxe or advanced brace.

Oat bran, like oatmeal, is very healthy and helps lower cholesterol. It is universally considered a heart healthy food. Another benefit is providing fiber and as an aid to digestion.I mix mine with flaxseed, cinnamon and cut up  pieces of fruit for a natural sweet taste & added nutrition. It's a little bitter plain but when mixed with ingredients I mentioned it's quite creamy and delicious.Another added benefit is the price. Hodgson Mill had the best price when compared with other brands. Also it's a lot less expensive than your local supermarket. For the price sold here you get 12 sixteen ounce boxes. Each box makes 11 half a cup servings. With 12 boxes you'll have enough to make 132 total servings. This is definitely a great deal.

This is a great product. When it arrived I took one capsule about 7 PM. By 8 PM I felt tired and very relaxed. I took my blood pressure and it was down to 120/73 (about 5-10 numbers lower than usual at this time). At 11 PM I took my usual low dose prescription for blood pressure and went to sleep. That night I slept about 2 hours longer than usual. In the morning, after breakfast, my blood pressure numbers were lower than usual. The numbers read 126/82 instead of the usual 135/85 in the morning.Since then I've used it several times in the evening but I only use half a capsule because it's very strong. This is a great tranquilizer. It really relaxes you and helps you sleep. Furthermore, it definitely lowers blood pressure.I was considering using this instead of prescription blood pressure medication. However, I'm still not sure how safe it is for long term use. I read on webmd that it should be used for up to 3 months at a time. Anyway I will use it as an occasional supplement to help get better sleep and to lower occasional high blood pressure from stress or salty meals.At this price I would definitely order this again. Highly recommended for high blood pressure, anxiety, restlessness and insomnia. However, I'm not sure that it's completely safe for long term or daily use. I need to do more research on this product.

Numerous times so far I've used this Nitric-Oxide complex along with L-Citrulline with very happy returns. You do not have to take it every day. Just use as needed. It works because L-Arginine works better with L-Citruline when taken together.I use this combo about 30 minutes before playtime with a glass of water. Each time it has enhanced the experience. This is much safer than most other supplements of this type. Both of these supplements are sold here on Amazon. Also this will not cause insomnia or jitters. I recommend trying this first using 1 capsule of each supplement taken at the same time.You may want to know that the effect (firmer erections and more joy) lasts about 2 hours or so. Also when it wears off it seems to lower rather than raise your blood pressure. This is another happy side effect of L-Arginine. You've got to be cautious because some so-called natural supplements can raise your blood pressure and even kill you. The ones to watch out for, according to my doctor, are the ones that last for days.

About 10 years ago I started using New Balance sneakers which used to be very thick, durable and strong. However, New Balance have gotten cheaper and cheaper with each new model. The company (New Balance) has cut corners to save money. By doing so they have officially lost business with me and countless other former customers. Along comes Nike to the rescue.I first saw Nike Mens Air Monarch IV in a local store and was very impressed. This sneaker is very thick and strong which is necessary if you play sports or walk long distances. The Nike shoe is made like the old New Balance about 10 years ago. The top, bottom and inside is very thick and strong as it should be.I've used this Nike brand 6 times so far for working out (about 45 minutes to an hour each time). So far they look and feel great. I didn't hear any squeaking as mentioned by other reviewers. The first use did feel snug or a bit tight. After that it just felt comfortable. That, to me, is a sign of a good well fitting sneaker. Another great thing is that they were almost $10 cheaper than in the local store. I would definitely buy these again in the future.

Overall these are sturdy comfortable sneakers. They are well padded and comfortable for walking. However, they are not as thick and strong as Nike Mens Air Monarch IV. Nevertheless K-Swiss are very good sneakers that are strong enough to last quite a while. In my opinion, though, these are not quite strong enough for tennis or other sports. For that I would highly recommend Nike Monarch IV which is more expensive. These K-Swiss are above average sneakers and definitely worth the price.

There are several problems with this item which I will list below:1.) It does not relieve knee pain at all. It feels just like watered down Sarna lotion (which is used for itching).2.) You get a tube which is smaller than 2 ounces. I compared it to a 2 ounce tube of petroleum jelly and this appears smaller (even considering shape, thickness, height,...etc.)3.) I opened the tube and held it upright. Then I squeezed all the way in before any liquid oozed from the top. In other words the tube appears to be about two thirds empty. You are actually getting about a half an ounce or less. You can feel mostly empty space as you squeeze.4.) The worst part is that the ingredients are not disclosed on the label. What if you're allergic to it? How would you know if it's harmful? Yes I know the ingredients are listed on Amazon but NOT anywhere on the product itself. Some ingredients can be contraindicated for certain people. Consumers, in my opinion, are entitled to have full disclosure of all ingredients of any product that is applied to their body.5.) Even if it did work this item is way over priced. I've seen larger tubes of pain relief cream in a dollar store that provide more pain relief than this one.6.) You're instructed to massage yourself for 2 minutes and use it after a warm shower. The truth is that self massage and a warm shower by itself can relieve muscle pain. Everyone who does this will find at least some relief.7.) The placebo effect is very strong indeed.8.) Many of the reviewers (certainly not all) have only 1-3 total reviews. This implies that they may be done by the seller and/or his employees.Why so many good reviews? Read the above carefully and decide for yourself. To me this is a scam and I am returning it for a refund. In spite of my truthful review here I'm sure some of you will not listen and buy this anyway. My advice is to try Biofreeze first. It won't cure you but at least Biofreeze does help relieve muscle pain in a pleasant way. This is a great example of buyer beware!

This is a nice looking glass bathroom scale. My old broken scale, which lasted about 5 years, cost about $10 dollars more than this one. Although the price was reasonable, the scale is not completely accurate. Four of us have weighed ourselves several times in a row (within seconds) and each time the weight changes by a range of 1-3 pounds. I can live with this because I just want to know my weight within a fairly accurate range. If it's off by 2 or 3 pounds that's not a big concern. However, if precise exact weight is important you'll need to search for a more accurate scale.

Like volume 1 you get 10 more card tricks. Again each trick is first demonstrated and then concisely explained. Once again the DVD is a little more than 30 minutes. I was slightly disappointed because the tricks are quite similar to volume 1 with some variations. Still the tricks are quite good and original. One complaint is that there are several tricks that require tearing cards in half. Mr Adams should have worked out ways to do the tricks without having to rip the cards. He mentions it but doesn't demonstrate. As a result you have to figure this out on your own. I couldn't help but feel I was reliving volume 1 since the tricks were somewhat similar. If you're into card magic like I am I still recommend this DVD because it's mostly original and does not require complicated sleight of hand. You do need time to practice each trick if you want to get it right. Overall, a nice treat for those who enjoy card magic tricks.

First of all, the magnet is not as strong as I expected. You have to get within an inch (or less) of most metal objects for it to work. The second problem is not giving any instructions at all. If I didn't already know some tricks this would be completely useless. The third problem is the size. Unless you're a child the ring will probably not fit. I'm a medium sized adult and can barely get the ring on and off. The last problem is the integrity of the seller. They enclosed a small note practically begging for a 5 star review. Part of the note says "We have posted positive feedback for you and hope you do the same for us". Newsflash: Sellers do not post feedback about customers! This is a blatant false statement. The seller also asks that you email them first if you aren't giving them 5 stars. This is one magic gimmick that I will rarely or never use again. I definitely do not recommend buying this item.

This is a great product for your skin. It helps with heat rash, diaper rash, eczema, burns, itchy skin and other skin irritations. It's most important ingredient is zinc oxide (11.3%) which is known to form a barrier on the skin and protect it from irritants such as heat or cold weather. It also helps the skin heal faster from various conditions. Balmex is the perfect external application for diaper rash. Usually a diaper rash can be dramatically healed after only 1 application. I've used it several times on a 2nd degree burn on my leg and it's now about 90% healed after 3 days of use. I noticed improvement several hours after each application.Why only 4 stars instead of 5? First, although it arrived in about a week, I received it with a damaged cover. When I received it a small piece of the cover was torn off and missing. Since the broken piece was not in the sealed package it means it was sent that way. If it was damaged in transit the missing piece would have been in the package. That shows negligence on the part of the seller. Also, this was not the best price. However, it was convenient to order through Amazon. Why is this called Balmex Adultcare? I checked the ingredients with regular Balmex and they both contain 11.3% zinc oxide along with other matching or identical ingredients. Calling it Adultcare seems misleading or deceptive because it's just Balmex and can be used on babies, children or adults regardless of age. Except for the minor things I just mentioned I'm very satisfied with the product and highly recommend it for skin problems. Being a large 12 ounce jar, it should last a very long time.

For $5 this should have been made with metal. Instead it's a cheap piece of plastic. Another problem with this trick is that it's awkward to perform. Sometimes it works and sometimes it gets stuck. This may only be good if you want to fool small children ages 3-5. I showed it to a 6 year old and she figured it out. Next time I'll wait for reviews before ordering a magic trick. If you're reading this save your money for something better.

This is 97% white petroleum which is the same as vasoline. You can easily buy 5 times the amount of vasoline at less than half the price. It's a fairly decent skin protector but definitely not worth the price. There should be a law requiring full disclosure of ingredients before you buy an item. Most of the time I have to search other websites to find a list of ingredients for many products sold here. I suggest people do their homework before buying. At least it comes in a small 1 ounce tin can. This makes it easy to take it with you when you leave home.

This is a great DVD for those interested in card magic. Although it only runs 37 minutes it contains 10 tricks that range from very good to excellent. The tricks are truly self working but also very effective. Each effect is first demonstrated and then fully explained. I've tried several tricks on friends and family members and got great reactions. As an amateur, I've seen a lot of card magic over the years but these are original tricks. Most tricks can be learned in 5-10 minutes. However, I recommend practicing first before showing them. Otherwise, you're likely to spoil a great effect. My favorite trick is called "Hypnodeck". It requires a setup but if you know how to false shuffle this trick is truly amazing. You ask the spectator a few questions and without knowing the name of a thought of card you deal from the deck (face down) until you arrive at the exact card thought of by a spectator. There are other excellent magic tricks included but this is my favorite. With 10 really amazing tricks this is perfect for those who want to learn truly amazing tricks in a clear concise way.

My knee measures 15.5 inches around the middle. I ordered the large and it fits just right. You can easily adjust it with two straps (top & bottom). I use this on my right knee which gives me minor problems from past surgery. On my left knee, which is worse, I use the Shock Doctor Ultra, which is a better support. If you have mild to moderate knee problems, the McDavid support will do a great job of eliminating or minimizing pain. However, if your knee is very bad (like my left knee) I'd recommend the Shock Doctor Ultra which is a more advanced deluxe knee brace. When I play sports (tennis, handball or raquetball) I always use the McDavid on my right knee and the Shock Doctor Ultra on my left knee. So far I've not had any serious knee problems with these supports after more than a dozen uses. One time only I tried the McDavid on my left knee while playing handball. Although it protected it I did have some pain the next day which required icing and rest for 2 days. With the Shock Doctor Ultra, which has more support, I never had a problem other than minor soreness. If you have old knee injuries that prevent you from exercising, the McDavid will reduce your pain by at least 80%. The Shock Doctor Ultra, which is a more deluxe brace, reduces my pain by more than 90%. However, the Shock Doctor Ultra is about $10-$15 more than the McDavid. Depending on the seriousness of your knee problems the extra cost may be well worth it. On the other hand, The McDavid support may be all you need.

I use these on my digital therapy machine and they work great. These also work on the older TCM iMassager as well. They may or may not work on other tens units so I suggest you find out before making a purchase.The stick is more than adequate. When you first use them it feels as if the batteries have just been fully charged because the machine becomes more powerful. After about 10 uses or so, at about 1/2 hour per session, the pads will not stick as well. This is normal as it wears out. For most treatments, if you feel it's not a strong stick, just wrap with an ace bandage. When held in place the stick is perfect. If you prefer you can also use some duct tape to hold the pads in place. Even without it I don't have a problem with the stick for about 10-12 uses.Overall a great deal compared to the greedy sellers who try to sell you one third the amount of pads at triple the price. I suspect that many of the negative reviews are from competitors or from people who don't know how to use their machine. I highly recommend these if your unit is compatible.

This has the exact opposite effect that it's supposed to have. It does, however, lower your blood pressure and get you to fall asleep. For what it's intended to do it just doesn't do anything. Perhaps if you take it every day for weeks it may do something. For me, it did nothing except make me too tired to do anything. The good news is that when I stopped taking it, everything returned to normal. I suggest trying something else that has a more direct effect.

My review below is based on my bad experience with this watch. Although it didn't work for me, it may be okay for you. Nevertheless, I'm warning everyone to think twice before buying this watch.When I received this watch, I wasted over an hour trying to unsuccessfully set the time. The manual is so tiny that it requires reading glasses to read. Pages are so small that you can go blind trying to read it. Even worse are the many multiple steps required to just set the time. Casio needs to include a quick start sheet written in normal size print so people can actually see it. Setting the time should take no more than 5 minutes maximum! The lesson learned here is to always buy a watch in person where you can try it out in the store. I've used many watches of this type and usually figure it out in a few minutes (sometimes without the need for the manual). There are too many unnecessary features that this watch has which may only be useful if you can read it. Furthermore, you need clear simple step by step instructions. Unfortunately Casio does not provide readable or clear instructions. As a result, it makes the watch useless (for me at least).The main problem is that Casio got caught up trying to include too many multiple features (most of which are unnecessary). For example, how many people want to know what time it is in Japan or Germany? A good useable watch should not be so difficult to use.Fortunately I was able to send it back to Amazon for a refund. I did that the day after I received it.

When I received this I was in shock. It's the cheapest looking piece of ultra thin tin I ever saw. Also it's much smaller than the photo would have you believe. My hand is slightly bigger. To me it looks like a cheap item you would find in an inexpensive discount store. However, what's worse is that it was not even useable. Here's why:I tried many times to open the battery compartment but couldn't. After reading the skimpy 4 page instructions and trying repeatedly I gave up. It appears that the battery compartment is cemented shut. It would not open on either end no matter how much I tried. Even if it did open the device appears much too fragile to last. It looks and feels like it can fall apart just by blowing on it. I'd compare it to aluminum foil or a cheap piece of jewelry.I'm now waiting for Amazon to authorize a return.
