This item is absolutely the worst purchase I ever made here (fortunately that's not the norm). Definitely not recommended.If anyone knows of a real acupuncture device that works please post here. I'd gladly pay double or triple the price for something that's made with the consumer in mind rather than a device with cheap or skimpy material.After seeing this pen which is made from shoddy material I think 1 star is very generous! I hope no one else gets scammed by this.

These are a less expensive alternative to the Zensah sleeves that I bought 2 years ago for over $40. These Red Lion sleeves are almost the same but about 60% cheaper (in price but not quality!).I have 15" calves and ordered the medium/large. Nevertheless they are still quite tight and hard to put on. Once on, however, they are generally comfortable and can be worn for hours without problems except for creases and marks in the skin when removed. However, this goes away in about an hour or so after you take them off.The good news is that, for me at least, they protect my legs and allow me to exercise without serious pain. I have an old injury in my left calf which causes discomfort & pain if I do too much exercise. Recently my right leg developed painful shin splints. Now that I've used these for a few weeks I'm back to exercising regularly and I no longer have serious shin pain after exercise.If you have pain in your calves or shins, these will reduce the pain by about 70-80% and allow you to recover much faster. I definitely recommend them because they do the job and are sold as a pair at a fair price. Some companies are so greedy that they sell only one leg sleeve at twice the price. In my opinion Zensah leg compression, although slightly better quality, are sold at an outrageous ripoff price. I took a chance getting these and I'm glad I did.

Ultimate Self Working Card Tricks is an amazing collection of 11 great self working card tricks. Just because they are self working doesn't mean they are easy to perform. I had to spend at least 30 minutes to an hour for each of the 6 tricks that I've performed so far. However, the magical effects will get great reactions.I love card magic and I perform it for friends and family whenever the opportunity arises. Although I'm an amateur I've seen many card tricks throughout the years. These tricks are quite original but sort of similar to ones I've done before. Nevertheless these are amazing tricks which can easily take months to master all 11 routines. I've had this for about a month and still need to practice and learn 5 more tricks.The high price might turn many people off and that is justified. I feel this is more expensive than it should be which will limit sales. I bought this because card magic is my favorite form of magic and because I can afford it. Also I wanted to find some new miracles to perform. This DVD does deliver and I'm glad I bought it.A cheaper way to learn card magic, which is what I usually have done, is to go to a library and borrow books. However, I've never come across such good tricks like you'll find here in this DVD. The question is "Is this worth the price?" The answer depends on you. If you love great magic tricks with cards, like I do, then Ultimate Self Working Card Tricks is worth every penny. It has 11 terrific tricks which are absolutely amazing.

I bought this directly from Swanson about 2 months ago as a supplement for high blood pressure. Occasionally my pressure goes up somewhat even though I take a small dose of prescription medication (5 mg amlodipine). When my numbers have gone over 130/85 I take half a capsule (it's easy to open and close). So far I've used this about 5 times and each time it lowers the top and bottom numbers by at least 10 points or more. Earlier today, for example, my pressure reading (using a home monitor) was 135/88. This caused me to have a slight headache. I again took half a capsule of Amealpeptide with a small glass of water. About 20 minutes later my headache was gone. After another 20 minutes or so I again took my blood pressure and was amazed. It went down to 110/68. Every time I use this (about once a week) it produces similar results in less than an hour. Although it comes with only 30 capsules the way I use it it's like getting 60. At this time I won't replace this for my prescription. However, as an occasional supplement to help lower blood pressure this is excellent. I will definitely be ordering this again in the future.

WARNING: Do not waste your money on this like I did. It's not even worth $1. This is not a book. It is a brief pamphlet briefly describing about 10 very basic bits of card magic. That's right - incomplete bits of magic. The so-called tricks are not even explained in detail. Do you think 1 or 2 paragraphs is enough to explain a card trick? In most cases the answer is definitely NO!I mistakenly thought this was a new book at Amazon. I was completely wrong. This pamphlet is not for anyone. It is not even suitable for a beginner because it is so very basic. It deserves 0 stars because it should not be sold here at all.If you want to learn card tricks I suggest Scarne On Card Tricks which is an excellent REAL book. Also recommended is Karl Fulves books. His first, called "Self-Working Card Tricks" is a great start for beginners. The first page introduction to this crap says (I'm not making this up) "It is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any health problem....". I honestly believe the author got mixed up and copied the wrong material into the wrong pamphlet. You have all been warned. Do not, under any circumstances, waste your time with this fake wannabe book!

This is a soothing and cooling gel that effectively relieves pain in your muscles or joints. I've used it successfully to relieve most of my pain in my knees and lower back. To use it properly, spread a thin layer on the painful area but do not rub it in. Also do not cover it. Allow the injured area to be exposed to the air. Within 3-4 minutes you will feel a cooling and soothing effect on your injury. It feels like a thin layer of ice which is what seems to relieve pain. Also, the cooling effect seems to last about 1-2 hours. The nice thing is that it doesn't sting or burn and can be used every 2-3 hours without any noticeable side effect except relief. This is a large tube and can last for months. Also the price was fair. I highly recommend trying this. You won't be disappointed.

This is a great 8-outlet surge suppressor at a great price. I went to several stores selling similar items for much more than the price here. Also most only had 6 outlets while this one has 8.Since I got this a few weeks ago I can now run my portable heater safely without it shutting off (by itself) every 10 minutes. This surge suppressor has 2400 joules which makes it safe for heaters, lights, TVs, treadmills and most other electronic equipment. Another plus is that this comes with Child-safe outlet covers so small children can't put their fingers into the outlets. The covers are very easy to remove when needed. The chord is 6 feet which is long enough for me. I'm glad I found this here at such a good price. Highly recommended if you need to safely plug in several electronic devices at once.

I'm allergic to aspirin and researched Serraflazyme about a year ago as an alternative. This supplement helped ease my knee and joint pains within a day. It claims to have multiple uses including pain relief from sprains, joint pain relief, improved blood circulation, enlarged prostate relief and many other health benefits. I can't speak for all those claims but it definitely works for joint pain. I was very skeptical but was surprised that this worked as well as motrin without major side effects. Another pleasant surprise is that it seems to lower blood pressure by about 10-15 points within an hour or so. If you're like me and have had side effects from pain medication this is a great alternative.When I bought this last year it came with 100 tablets. When I had pain I used it 3 times a day for 3-4 days and it relieved my pain and reduced leg swelling due to a sports related injury. My wife also used it for low back pain and she said it works like aspirin but without stomach cramps. I still have about 20 tablets left because we only use it occasionally when needed. Definitely recommended and worth trying for mild to moderate pain. If you have pain from an injury you can take it up to 4 times a day. I took it up to 3 times a day without a problem except that it made me a little tired. It actually helps you sleep. After a few days perhaps your pain will decrease to the point where you won't need it any more.

This has been surprising effective for lowering my occasional high blood pressure. I take a low dose of prescription amlodipine (5 mg) which usually controls my blood pressure. However, sometimes when I eat a salty meal or have had a stressful day, my pressure rises a little too high and causes headaches. I use a good blood pressure monitor and check my pressure regularly at home.I've used these apple cider vinegar capsules about 6-7 times in the last 3 weeks about twice a week so far and it consistently lowered my blood pressure with just 1 capsule. When my pressure goes high it's usually around 138/88 to about 142/90. Every time I notice this (once or twice a week) I take an apple cider vinegar capsule with a glass of water and each time my pressure gets reduced within 1-2 hours. The numbers would generally go low to about 108/68. As a bonus my headache (from elevated pressure) completely vanishes in less than an hour. I've used liquid apple cider vinegar with honey before with moderate success of 5-15 points. These capsules work even better and I don't have to tolerate the horrible taste of the vinegar. Another great thing here is that you get 180 capsules which should last for a few months. Also, unlike liquid vinegar, these are easy to take with you when not at home.I'm wondering if this can substitute for prescription medicine. I'm afraid to try because when I forget to take my medicine (before bed) I wake up in the middle of the night with a headache which reminds me that I forgot.Although this may have many health benefits people who take insulin must be cautious. Taking apple cider vinegar along with insulin might cause potassium levels in the body to be too low. For those who are having lots of side effects from prescription medicine perhaps this may help you reduce or eliminate it. However, you should first consult with your doctor which I'm also planning to do. I will definitely order this again in the future.

My wife wanted to try DermaSafe's Stretch mark are scar cream.I have not used this product long term but during the two weeks I have been using it I have seen results.I used it on a  dry patch on my elbow that never really seems to go away which is much softer now.The stretch marks on my thighs have faded a little and the scar on my daughter's face has faded a little.I like that it has aloe and its has a nice clean fragrance that my four year old said makes her feel happyand she liked how it made her boo boo feel.  Also though not indicated for this but I put this on a bee stingand it helped with  the itching and redness.

I ordered the Bamoer Cubic Zirconia Flower Design 3/8" Stud Earrings with White & Rose Gold Plated Settingfor my wife. My wife sometimes wears costume jewelry. When she saw these earrings, she wanted to try them out.The earrings actually look better in person. My wife loved them. They are large but they hang very well on my wife.She likes them and although they are not daily wear earrings, she will wear them occasionally for casual and dress up events.I received this item at no charge or discounted in exchange for a fair and honest review.

I ordered the Bamoer Luxury White Gold Plated Bracelet for Women with Sparkling Clear Cubic Zirconia inlaidfor my wife. Although this is gold plated with Zirrconia stones it looks really good.My wife likes it very much. The quality is very good. It does not look like some cheap flea market costume jewelry.The stones are set very well. This is not a daily wear piece but would look very classy for special occasions.I received this item in exchange for a fair and honest review.

I ordered the Tahari Oversized Pointelle Knit Wrap for my wife.This scarf is so amazingly soft.  Its simple yet elegant and very versatile.I like that it is large enough to be a shawl wrap or wear around the waist.It is not too heavy for the Florida winter. It could be worn for dress up or down.It is a very deep blue with a glittery thread woven in. It really look nice and seems to be a great value.I received this item  at no charge or a discounted charge in exchange for a fair and honest review.

My wife and I wanted the Father.son 10"x10" Bamboo Baby Washcloths Premium Soft Absorbent Towels Set for Baby's Sensitive Skin Perfect Reusable Wipes with Gift Box (Pack of 7) (White) as a gift for her brothers newborn. The washclothsare very good quality. They are very soft. My wife was impressed and thought her Brothers family would love them.The only issue is that these are manufactured in China and someone in quality control made a hugespelling error on the inside packaging. The outside packing says Father - son but on the inside towelsit said "Farther -son" (See image). It didn't matter much to me. My Brother in law laughed until he cried.These are great hand towels and would get 5 stars from me if the fix the spelling error on the inside packaging.

I ordered the ZOEREA Unisex Newborn Baby Romper Long Sleeve Christmas Sweaters Coat Deeras a gift for my Brother and sister in law. My wife examined it when it arrived.She really liked it and thought her Brothers family would love it for their newborns first Christmas.The only thing she thought would improve the romper is if the real button on the romper werefalse buttons that used snaps. Having to use buttons slows the diaper changing process.The romper is soft and looks great. My in-laws loved it.*I received this item for free or at a discounted price in exchange for a fair and honest review*

I've used Viva Labs foods and supplements for awhile now. I have found their products safe, effective and enjoyable.I like Viva Labs Glucosamine, Chondroitin and MSM. The formula is designed to help with joint, cartilage formationand skin health. I have been taking the ingredients found in Viva Labs formula for yearsand I feel they have helped with joint pain I have had in my Knee.I will continue to take this supplement and highly recommend it for people suffering typical joint pain.

I really like the Philips SHB5850BK/27 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones.This is my third set of Bluetooth headphones. So far they are better than thelow end headphones I own. The Phillips head phones paired to my phone easily.the ear pieces fit well and are comfortable. I listen to a lot of pop music at the gym.These are perfect for light music. The bass is not overwhelming.The soft headphone wire allows these to fit in my gym shorts pockets.I recommend these for the casual and active user.

Hylands cough syrup is great for my little one when she has  just a cough.So many products contain unnecessary ingredients and alcohol.I feel comfortable giving this to her  and it helps her too.I have been using this for her since she was 6months old.She doesn't mind the taste and it's priced fairly.

The Zak Designs sippy cups are great.  The perfectflow valve is very convenient to remove and clean.The cups are very sturdy and are not top heavy, so they tip over less than other cups we have tried.My girls love the bright colors and animal designs especially the orange one.They are resonably priced and Zak has great quality products.

My wife and I liked AmazonBasics 400 Thread Count Sheet Set, Queen, White.Amazon Basics is a simple brand. These sheets are simple and economical but not low quality.They do not have a cheap feel to them. I always wash sheets before using them.Who knows what they were treated with before being imported.These sheets are soft and did not wrinkle when washed. They look good and the fit and feel are very good.

My 3 and 4 year old daughters really like VTech Go! Go! Smart Friends Healthy Friends Check-up Clinic.Doctor Doug talks the play set can play music and sounds. Besides it's electronic featuresthe play set includes track pieces that allow you to alter the look of the set.The track pieces also allow you to connect to the other Go Go Smart play sets.This is our first Go Go Smart set. We might get the other sets if my children continue to enjoy this set.

My 3 and 4 year old girls love Disney Junior Super Stretchy Game.I know twister was taken but they could have come up with a better name for this game.My girls laugh and giggle while playing this twister like game. It is sized for little bodiesand 2 small ones can play easily. This is a fun game for the children to play andfun for adults to watch. It seems a good value at it's price of about $16.My family enjoys it and recommends it.

I wanted to try Bio Spot's Active Care Flea and Tick Spot on with Applicator for Medium Dogs.I was interested in trying the new applicator. I have used Bio Spot's flea and tick control formulas before.I have never had a problem with pests. The formula has been safe and effective for my dogs.I wasn't impressed with the applicator. it was a bit of a novelty to me.

I raised my 2 older dogs on dog foods their first 2 years of life.I decided to try this food on my puppy. My puppy did eat it. he doesn't seem overly excited by it.The ingredients seem to be average quality. It does contain grains.I was hoping for a resealable bag. This is a large bag and will last for awhile.Since this bag is not resealable it might attract pests.I transferred the food to a airtight container that I purchased for my dogs.

I only have one cat but he seems to like the IRIS USA CL-083 Cat Tree, 5-Tier.This cat tree took about 20 minutes to put together. I had some help from my wife.This cat tree isn't very tall and the hiding places aren't very large. If you have a larger cat,they might not be able to fit in some of the hiding places.Our cat likes to sit on the perches and scratch on the post. He likes it and that isthe most important thing. I think it looks nice and seems like a good value.

My daughters really like the Baby Genius Talking DJ Interactive Hand Puppet with Electronic Sounds by Manhattan Toy.They love to play with it and my wife and I love to amuse them with it.It does talk. It is able to say 6 different phrases. I'm not sure why they would make a battery operated toy with batteriesthat cannot be replaced. Why? I would have given it 5 stars if the batteries can be replaced.It is an entertaining toy but prepare for it to go silent one day and just be an ordinary puppet.

My three chihuahuas love Blue Dog Bakery's Deli Sticks.They smell like slim jim jerky sticks. They are easily broken up by hand for smaller dogs.The treats are made in the USA. This treat is one of my dogs favorite treats. They really like themand have had no digestive issues.

I really like Garden of Life Dr. Formulated Probiotics. I like the formula.I have used garden of life's products in the past. When it comesto probiotics, you have to trust the company, otherwise you might be wasting your time.The maker has loaded this product with many strains of bacteria.I had no digestive issues with this formula. I don't take probiotics year round but do take themafter using antipiotic and for general health maintenance 2-3 times a year.

My young daughters loved playing with Build & Imagine Malia's Beach House Building Kit.This doll house lets your child use their imagination to build their house, their way.So many toys like this allow you to build a building one way.My daughters didn't care for the flat "dolls" included with this set.They preferred to use their other 3d dolls.One good thing about this set is it works with other build and imagine sets.I like that this toy set is teaching my daughters skills that are often seen in boy toys but seldom seen in girl toys.I highly recommend this toy set for the parent whose child loves to build things and has a vivid imagination.
